name: Kits
description: Kits is an assembly game. Discover, construct and admire beautiful little works of art. Set your own complexity and challenge levels and enjoy KITS the way you like to play.

name: Bad Piggies Build
description: Bad Piggies Build is a cancelled webgame meant to release in 2012 by Rovio Entertainment, however, this game was never mentioned or announced by the company and was left in mystery until a SWF download was found on the Appspot link.

name: Bad Piggies: Create Your Own Angry Birds Levels!
description: Bad Piggies: Create Your Own Angry Birds Levels! is a cancelled webgame meant to release in 2011 by Rovio Entertainment, the game was never mentioned or announced by the company and was left in mystery until a website was found in 2021, and its data was already deleted from the server thus it wouldn't load, but an earlier version of the game was found that actually worked, but you need to have Adobe Flash though for it to load.

name: In-Flight Tennis Club
description: Sin descripción

name: 3D Football
description: A football game that comes as a part of the Emirates In-Flight Entertainment.

name: 3D Cricket
description: A cricket game that comes as a part of the Emirates In-Flight Entertainment.

name: Farkle King
description: FarkleKing play online with unique features and exciting play modes is always full of strategy and highly confrontative that makes it more special than others – what you throw may not make you win but what you choose in a wise way will make you King.

name: Faily Brakes 2
description: Let’s start the race on a high speed in the car crashing game Faily Brakes 2! You have to stay behind the wheel as long as possible and not crash the car. Watch out the cars which will try to hit you! Smash 'em all, survive as long as possible on the road & win in the demolition derby. Get ready and take part in the race for survival!

name: Century City
description:
Mine the fortune low underground and build the greatest city of the century.
Go on an adventure with your cute little miner buddies. Tap to mine for gold, and watch as the money keeps piling up. Slowly build up your city with all kinds of different buildings from homes, schools, banks to parks and markets.

name: Beat Bop: Pop Star Clicker
description: You've got an audience wherever you go, so gather your bandmates, upgrade your guitar and costumes, avoid media scandals, wear your best idol smile and put on the show of your life.

name: Bull King of Circus
description: The new play-style 3D racing & action game that it is easy to control.

name: Beach Mini Golf 2
description:
This sports game is a new, high-quality, and easy-to-use 3d minigolf 3d game for your phone and tablet.
Play up to 60 levels golf course in a beautiful island.
Each hole contains additional obstacles and complex angles. Aim well and make putts in a minimum shots !
Try to stay below par on every hole to win 3 stars! Train yourself to become the master of mini golf club.

name: Basket and Ball
description: Tap the jump button to bounce the living ball as if you are dribbling it! Lead the stray ball into the basket passing acrobatic trials and solving puzzles. Test your throwing aim every 3 levels. Use the time stopping bonus to get out of difficult situations. Avoid robot cops and fire traps, jump over spikes, dive into water, and propel yourself with explosions on 120 challenging levels. iCade and MFI gamepads are fully supported!

name: Baseball Battle
description: Step up to the plate in Wil & Shelby's Baseball Battle and take on the world in classic pitcher-vs-batter duels. Hit and pitch with ease using intuitive multi-touch controls. Earn points to increase your power, accuracy and intuition with each victory. Featuring input from 2013 Rookie of the Year Wil Myers and St. Louis ace Shelby Miller, the battle for baseball supremacy is on!

name: Air Hockey Halloween
description: Air Hockey Halloween is a great air hockey game with halloween theme, beautiful graphics, great effects, easy to learn, hard to master gameplay, and it's free! Play against the gruesome, horrifying monsters with the fearless monster hunter in the game's campaign, and try to beat each enemy the best way you can to unlock new content, or play against your friend on the same device! 24 different monsters to beat on 4 levels.

name: Jigsaw Tile
description: This is a very addictive innovation crush game, Unique gameplay will make you unconsciously indulge them forget the time. The game is very easy to get started, but it is very difficult to get a high score!

name: Jumpox
description:
Follow Jumpox on its adventure to the new lands
Challenge yourself with this simple, yet difficult game
Tap anywhere to jump up or down
Avoid all deadly spikes

name: Kick and Cows
description: Kick and Cows is a mixture of football and animal teams, top-down arcade game and logic challenges in all levels. In a nutshell, you have to score a goal in every of the 30 levels in each of the 7 worlds. Each and every one of the worlds has a unique design and new features making the game more challenging and compelling.

name: Jack the Knight Adventures 2
description:
An unprecedented touch reaches you: The Adventures of Jack Knight
Jack, this brave knight of whom all great heroes are inspired ...
You're the only one who can help Jack in this adventure !!!
You will help him to overcome Fear, loneliness, brave a thousand dangers to conquer the ultimate goal: Love !!

name: Smartsquid
description: Smartsquid - how fast is your brain?

name: Grids
description:
Welcome to Grids!
Grids is a tactical turnbased online strategy game where you take control of your very own army!
The objective of the game is to defeat your opponents commander-unit (the tower).
You can choose between connecting to our grids-servers, and get matched against an opponent, or you can host your own game and let your friends connect to you. Hosting a game requires port forwarding.

name: Gyro Skate
description:
Gyro Skate turns your iPhone into a skateboard for your fingers.
You do a trick and Gyroskate knows what’s going on.

name: Golden Manager
description: Sin descripción

name: Sleepy Squares
description:
The goal is to help the Sleepy Squares get to sleep by placing them next to their fellow squares. The catch is they only close 1 eye for every square adjacent to them and they all have a different number of eyes.
That’s right, it has infinite potential if you are up for the challenge. Show off to your friends in our global sleepy leaderboards and see where your sleep IQ stacks up. Unlock multiple game modes and play them simultaneously with all your game data kept intact.

name: Santa Draw Ride
description: Santa Draw Ride is a physics based endless winter game which give you a Christmas mood! Santa rushes on his magic sleigh in search of lost Christmas gifts. Your task is to draw an icy road that will help Santa Claus to collect gifts and bonuses, as well as avoid dangerous traps and obstacles such as birds, snow islands, snowmans, x-mas trees etc.

name: PayaPaya
description:
PayaPaya is a drop-type puzzle game.
This is obtained score by connecting at least 4 of the same color coming from above the two blocks.

name: Pam's Fantastic Escape
description:
Are you up for a cozy escape-room puzzle adventure...in a dream-like world? Let's go now!
Linn (that's you!) is going camping with Pam (Pandora, your best buddy) and Tammy (Pam's sister) for the weekend. The game starts from Pam's garage, then moves on to a mountain cottage and more mysterious places.
In order to go on your adventure, you need to solve puzzles to find the way forward through multiple chapters!

name: Out of Body
description:
Souls are on the loose! They need your help in guiding them higher and higher towards the heavens in this terrifically twisted and exciting endless adventure!
Being dead sure isn’t easy. These poor souls have to navigate tricky environments in order to spirit away. Help them evade obstacles (these souls don’t like bonking their heads on things any more than living people do!) and collect precious gems; use these gems to unlock new worlds and explore amazing new stories.

name: Mini Boxing
description:
You control "Nick-Joe" the Fighter so help him to win the Boxer championship tournament!
But you need to defeat six great-funny boxer to win the challenge.

name: Magic Words: Craft Words
description:
Welcome to Magic Words, a new free game! This puzzle game will improve your vocabulary and spelling skills. Use letters and make words together with a young magician, try dozens of challenging and fun tasks.
Don’t get confused if you can't find a word. There are lots of different hints that will help you - highlight a correct word, use magic letters or just refresh all of them.
Make the application and input languages different to learn new foreign words, increase your vocabulary and practice your spelling skills.

name: Universe 42
description:
Welcome to never-ending world of the Universe 42.
Universe 42 is a 2D endless runner game.
Your mission is to collect resources to discover new planet that fits for life.
Universe 42 presents you with a infinite world to explore, filled with unique planets and lifeforms, and constant danger and action: asteroids, electric fields, dangerous obstacles.

name: Twisted Machines
description: Master the wasteland by killing off marauding freaks in their twisted machines. Unleash these monstrous racing machines to bash your way through the hazardous wasteland highway. Avoid endless riders from ramming into you to be victorious.

name: Top Dungeon War
description: Your are hero and mission is clear: defeat the monsters, claim the treasure, and save the hostages who have been taken captive by the evil forces that dwell within the dungeon. But this will not be an easy task. The monsters are relentless, and their numbers are vast. From hordes of slavering goblins to towering giants and deadly dragons, you will need all of your skills and abilities to overcome the obstacles that stand in your way.

name: Super Boy Adventurous
description:
The year is 2999 and the galaxy is in chaos. Humanity has discovered alien technology allowing space travel between the planets, opening up the universe for exploration and conquest.
War happen from more alien attack on our planet.
The Super Boy Adventurous have a mission impossible. Must be destroy all the enemy, keep the earth for our child.

name: Super Swish
description:
Shoot Hoops Like it's 1990!
With simple one-handed game play, Super Swish is a basketball game that's easy to pick up and play whenever you feel like shootin' some hoops!
There's no timer - it's just you vs. the hoop. The more swishes you make in a row, the more you score. The more you score, the harder it gets. Miss 3 shots and it's game over!

name: Slide On Ice
description: Do you like taking on the hardest games ever to constantly push your skills to the edge? If your answer is yes, then Slide On Ice is just the perfect game for you right now!

name: Spangled
description: Another brain twisting puzzle game from Unexpect3rd Development. Match 3 with a twist! Slide and drop pieces then match either colors or patterns. Survive long enough to score high or clear stage goals.

name: Whacky Ball
description:
In Whacky Ball, your device's camera transports you into a world of challenging ball games. Using motion recognition, you whack the balls virtually on the screen using your hands or head as if you are really there.
Whack the birds and other flying objects before they whack into your ball. Score three times in a row to win bonus points.

name: Wizard Golf RPG
description: This is the story of an adventuring hero who doesn't mind being below par. As a powerful wizard, you'll make your way through each floor of a treacherous dungeon, one hole at a time. Instead of using a ball and clubs, you'll propel yourself through each carefully constructed corridor. The hazards on these courses are a bit more hazardous than usual. Don't worry: you've got a spell or two you can use against the monsters that lurk in the roughs.

name: Yum! Finger
description:
"Yum finger" is a leisure exciting game, players in the game's role is a little fat man is trying to lose weight, you need to finger on the screen, moving through crazy escape cake, ham, green beans, donuts, bananas, etc., which are small monster, once they touch, the fat man will explode! But don't worry, food monsters will be according to their own favorite fixed track running, so as long as your response fast enough, or after a few sessions, just to avoid them well!
Set in the game, there are props, novice players can through use of them to put into this crazy game as soon as possible and then got gold and the great achievement badges. Do not hesitate to begin the fun and exciting trip to burn calories glory!!!!

name: Push-Up T-Rex
description:
This is the story of Felix the T-Rex.
Since he hatched from the egg, he has dreamed of being the first T-Rex doing Push-Ups.
Together you’ll discover the coolest cities of Planet Earth.
The more weights you collect on your journey, the longer the tiny little T-Rex arms will grow.

name: Milk Farm Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: KleptoCats Cartoon Network
description: Sin descripción

name: Iron Force 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Ice Scream United: Multiplayer
description: Sin descripción

name: Avatars Saga
description: Sin descripción

name: SimbaQuest
description: A short, April Fools adventure with dozen of interactions.

name: Perfect Fit
description: Casual drop box fit in the gap game

name: Crank! Push! Tilt!
description: An arcade-style dexterity game for the Playdate

name: Bold
description: Bold is a unique, quiet and elegant third person exploration game, as well as a Zen game for traveling, walking, watching picturesque landscapes. The protagonist of the game, deer (bold), finds deer herds and obtains inner peace by crossing grasslands, deep forests, wilderness, rivers, and lakes.

name: RushLane
description: Welcome to RushLane, an adrenaline-pumping, high-speed racing game set on the scenic forest roads! Take control of your car and navigate through the twists and turns while avoiding oncoming traffic and collecting points to unlock new vehicles.

name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Dream
description:
The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Dream is a fanmade remake of the Game Boy cult classic The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening, first published in 1993 and enhanced with colors in 1998 with its DX version.

The Solarus-made remake uses A Link to the Past graphics, extended with lots of custom sprites and tiles, in order to represent all the game’s characters, enemies and landscapes. Even the music has been remade in SNES-like fashion, to get the perfect feeling as if the game was released on Super Nintendo.

name: The Delusions of Maximillian Wurst
description: The first chapter of a loop-de-loop platformer in which you control Maximillian Wurst, silver-tongued poet and abject moron, as he pursues a fantasy that wants nothing to do with him. Escape Father Time! Shoot as many Chadwicks as you can! Stumble along with poison coursing through your lily liver!

name: Tappy Lap
description:
Fantastic one-finger Stock Car Racing!
Just "Tap" to change steering direction. Hold the screen to straighten up, speed match the car in front, or just brake. It's brilliantly context sensitive.
Get bonus points by Drafting other cars using the slipstream, blocking faster cars for a speed boost, or racing clean laps.

name: Pixel Puzzles
description: Bring the bigger picture into focus with Pixel Puzzles, a relaxing new grid-based puzzler. Uncover the hidden images as you swipe to connect number and color-based pixel patterns, revealing the image beneath. With smooth mechanics and stunning photography in themes from abstract to nature to outer space, Pixel Puzzles is equally as challenging as it is calming.

name: Match Pair 3D Puzzle
description:
Match Pair 3D Puzzle is a game to find matching pairs.
It's simple and fun, but it's not easy because each item moves.

name: Factor Find
description:
Inspired by the classic Word Search and Sudoku games, Factor Find is a puzzle game about math! The rules are simple: solve puzzles by making target numbers with factors on the board. For example, make 12 from 4*3 or 2*6.
Factor Find is more strategic than it initially appears. With the right strategy, it's possible to solve even the most complicated puzzles without doing complicated math! Calculators might be better than people at simple arithmetic, but they could never solve a Factor Find puzzle!

name: This Is Not a Ball Game.
description: This Is Not A Ball Game includes more than 90 challenging levels with Retina-quality graphics and a mysterious French genie as your guide. Swipe and tap the screen to launch balls into the arena to free Star Blocks, and bring the magic back to the Absurd Circus!

name: Slidey Feet
description:
The objective is to step on each icy block in the level, cracking it underneath you.
Once all the blocks are cracked, this will break away the small cluster of rocks blocking your exit.
But, if you step back on a cracked block, you will fall off and will have to start again... From the start! So pay close attention to where you step!

name: Solitaire
description:
Solitaire is a new experience of Solitaire Game. Play Solitaire to wake up your brain in the morning or to clear your mind before going to bed.
Solitaire has so many beautiful card's styles you can change and discover. You can touch or drag the cards to complete the game the way you feel most comfortable. Solitaire is concerned about the comfort of your experience. Solitaire has many card's styles and background's styles you can explore will make you feel excited and surprised.

name: Peck Peck's Garden
description:
Throw seeds to feed Peck Peck and watch the magic.
Find the secret way to grow flowers to harvest more seeds.

name: Cute Girls
description: Enjoy cute women! The adult puzzle game 'Cute Girls' contains many beautiful illustrations. The in-game illustrations are made up of beautiful colors and details, and you can enjoy a variety of characters.

name: WakaVR
description: Welcome to the VR game experience that combines the fast-paced action of Beat Saber and the classic arcade-style gameplay of Pac-Man. In this game, you'll step into a neon-infused world, ready to carve your path through each level.

name: FromWithin
description: A top down ole school shooter with great graphics

name: White Wolf: Treasure Hunter
description: Action-Adventure & Strategy saving your world from Dark world that you unleashed. Quest though 5 element temples, collect items, and throw items. Unlock the hidden treasure shadow card castle.

name: Back to the Dark
description: Singleplayer medieval-fantasy extraction looter with melee combat and the occasional arrow and spell. Demo available!

name: Beat Bricks
description: This game is very interesting, using the rebound principle of objects to play the game.

name: A Night With Neil
description: "A Night With Neil" is the first in, hopefully, a series of choose-your-own-adventure text games done in Twine focusing on my various characters. Hang out with Neil! Get banged by Neil! Get ate by Neil!

name: Archery Battle VR
description: Archery Battle VR is a virtual reality archery game that allows you to experience real archery movements in the game.

name: Alongside
description: Tower defense strategy in a hand-drawn atmospheric style. The action of which takes place in a fairy-tale world inhabited by animals. To survive, you will need to tactically consider the placement of units, control the hero, using his abilities to fight off the invading hordes of evil.

name: Abandoned World
description: Third-person action survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. After the big disaster you will face bad things

name: Bots Chaos
description: Can you finish this game in 10 minutes? Bots Chaos is an action FPS game where you must destroy many robots to beat a score in 10 minutes. You will never get bored in this casual, hard and fast paced semi procedural game full of annoying robots, lasers and chaos.

name: Blazing Ace
description: “I want to be stronger…” Summer bootcamp has begun!!! Let's make your dream come true!Beast Fella Foundation (BFF), an organization which monitors martial arts competitions among beastmen, has sent you an invitation letter. An unforgettable summer memory ensues.

name: Bushido: Drift and Race
description: Bushido is a racing game for all fans of Japanese automotive culture.

name: Bye Bye Swingby
description: 'Bye Bye Swingby' is a fresh and unique simulation game that tells a sad story of escaping a destroyed Earth and exploring a new world. Take a rocket into space and use the gravity of the stars to travel to new worlds in Swingby.

name: Celestial Raider
description: Celestial Raider is an exciting and fun sci-fi vertical shoot'em up game.

name: Casino Heist
description: Casino Heist is a Romantic Comedy Heist Visual Novel and Dating Sim where you play as ex-Formula One driver Enrique Roca as he charms his way around the Las Vegas Strip to help his crew get away with the Heist of the Century.

name: Car
description: Demonstrate your strong control ability in the game, allowing players to release their pressure through the game, and the wide track allows you to freely play driving.

name: Dark Dead
description: Dark Dead is a hardcore 2D action-platformer in which you have to fight an ancient evil and try to understand how and why you ended up in this place.

name: Crystal Blast
description: Crystal Blast is a single-player action-adventure game that offers a visually mysterious VR experience, created with Unreal Engine 5. Our goal is to survive in this mysterious cave and witness the remnants of past events while progressing towards the exit.

name: Don't Rage
description: Will you make it to the end of parkour? Be careful, if you fall, you start over!

name: Einheriar
description: "Einheriar" is a tower defense game that aims to prevent monster invasions. You must summon potential and talented warriors from the world to protect this land!

name: Endless Pinball
description: Welcome to the world of Endless Pinball, the addictive mobile game where you can challenge your skills and see how far you can go!

name: Fangun
description: This is Parkour.

name: FAS: Fight Action Sandbox
description: Unique turn-based sandbox 3D fighting game. Create your own character, fight AI or duel with friends online! Inspired by YOMI Hustle, TORIBASH and SPORE.

name: Fluxion
description: Fluxion is a thrilling 3D action platformer where you control a spaceship racing through a twisting tunnel, collecting energy orbs and avoiding obstacles.

name: Form Fitting
description: Form Fitting is a casual puzzle game where players must pick up different shaped blocks and drag them into the corresponding empty slots.

name: Getting to the Other Side!!!
description: A modern spin on the classic arcade game. Play the only game that allows the player to run around as a crazy chicken! Complete each level and try to reach the end if you dare!

name: Furies & Magazines: Episode 1
description: Graphic Novel Style Top Down Shooting Action Game which tells the story of Ivan Vinogradov, the victim of the CIA's top-secret project.

name: Hot Ice
description: Welcome to Hot Ice! First person mode gives you a full sense of presense, realistic physical puck and only a short moment to escape the colision! You can invite friends, build a team and play online, or try your luck and play alone offline with an AI partner against exstra smart AI guys.

name: Hell of Verdun
description: Hell of Verdun is a first person horror game in which you'll experience the horrors of the First World War. Will you manage to discover all the secrets and escape from this hell? It's up to you, soldier.

name: Heck City Delivery
description: Heck City Delivery is an arcade driving game inspired by Crazy Taxi. You play as a delivery goblin in the post-apocalypse, delivering food in your blood-powered car to the demons who inhabit Heck City, 20XX. Make your deliveries quickly and earn enough money to pay your rent!

name: Lovelorn Sanatorium Ⅳ
description: This is a spoof plot puzzle game. Click the dialogue to advance the plot. There are many puzzle-solving levels in the game. You can find props by exploring and solve puzzles according to the game prompts.

name: Inziva
description: A visual novel about you. Yes, you. "inziva" examines talking with your alter egos about your depression and traumas.

name: Peace Is Your Destiny
description: Peace is Your Destiny is a relaxing trip across an everlasting and colorful ocean. Clear islands by rolling your cube to match colored tiles. You will uncover surprises along the way towards a calmer and chill mindset. Its will Remove your anxiety and you will enter the world of Peace.

name: Nimblefoot
description: Nimblefoot is an action-packed parkour game where players must outrun and outsmart primitive hunters in pursuit. In Nimblefoot, you'll need to use all your skills to avoid obstacles and fend off monsters lurking in the forest.

name: One Soul
description: Explore dark dungeons. Wield your sword to attack enemies. Raise your shield to block attacks. Find keys to unlock doors. What will you discover?

name: Merging Cubes
description: Unique puzzle game absolutely addictive gameplay. Puzzles with thousands pieces! Hardcore challenges and infinite fun!

name: Sex Tonight
description: Sex Tonight - is the simplest 2D puzzle that you will remember with its hot images.

name: Role Model AI
description: Rolemodel.AI is a platform for creating personalized AI avatars that enhance personal growth and productivity. Customizable avatars can be experts in various fields, including game development and nutrition. The platform uses cutting-edge technology to revolutionize our interaction with technology.

name: Rise of the High Elf King: A Legacy of Blood
description: Take on the role of our protagonist in his epic rise to power to become High Elf King in this 2D side scroller set in a world of magic and fantasy.

name: Plasma Drone
description: "Plasma Drone" is a dynamic action game where you must fight to survive against waves of enemies. By upgrading your drone and weapons, you can effectively eliminate the enemy forces. The game offers 20 levels and a survival mode, which requires speed, precision, and strategy to survive.

name: Puzzle Panic Island
description: Puzzle Panic Island is a fast paced, skill-based match 3 Puzzle Platformer. You Control a character who must survive the Puzzle Blocks falling on their head and then Match them up, while also avoiding the Hazards they carry within! (Mostly Dinosaurs.)

name: QChat
description: Welcome to the mainland of Zelasda, where you can play the role of a survivor or use various props to evade the pursuit of regulators, crack the cipher machine, and escape from the manor to win!!!

name: Superior Crack Relatives
description: Superior Crack Relatives is a meme, couch-based multiplayer fighting game. Choose from a variety of balls and battle it out with up to 4 players in online multiplayer. Enjoy a variety of maps and characters, as you battle it out to be the ultimate champion.

name: Swipe Tennis
description: Swipe Tennis is an immersive sports game that offers players an opportunity to test their mouse skills by becoming a tennis champion

name: Sword Hero
description: An immersive fantasy survival game A thrilling adventure A powerful flying sword A bunch of skills with different functions Kill all evil

name: Somnus
description: Somnus is an action-packed dungeon crawler game where players embark on a perilous journey to defeat an ancient evil that poisons life underground. With cool pixel art and challenging gameplay, Somnus is an exciting adventure for gamers.

name: Starryard
description: Welcome to Starryard, an adrenaline-packed space flight shooter. In this game, you will play the role of a pilot of a spaceship, maneuvering the spaceship to shuttle between the stars, and at the same time need to defeat the enemy in fierce battles.

name: Story of Animal Sprite
description: Story of Animal Sprite is a casual merge game where you will restore the homeland for cute animals by building various fancy structures.

name: Shh! This is a mystery game! But watch out for spoilers
description: Reasoning... It's annoying.... I want to go home and play with Sara...❤ So please help me......

name: Tribal Legends
description: Welcome to Tribal Legends, an epic 2D cartoon-style shooter in which you play as a young tribal archer.

name: Things to Get
description: In this game, the user must pick up objects that will help him and solve the puzzles and finish the tasks. With each finished task the user will go to the next level. The user must look for objects that will help him solve the puzzles.

name: Vehicle Beat Zombie
description: Zombie incoming,fortunately,we got plenty of vehicle to use,armed with multiple weapons,avoid attacked by zombie by driving vehicles,open landscape give you advantage to take vantage point,use weapons to hit them,grenades ,firegrenade are handy,you can upgrade weapons to gain more chance to win.

name: Terminal Velocity
description: Terminal Velocity is an escape flight game. The pace of the game is very tight. The player's goal is to survive as much as possible.

name: Witch Race
description: "Witch Race" is a lightweight Rogue Auto Chess game, which tells the dark era of the Fantasy World Isefa continent. Strategic formation of army, unlock heroes, make good use of arms and powerful combination skills. Witness the final fate of Witch Race and understand the truth behind the story.

name: Vanishing Shadow
description: Game contentPlay as 12 characters, switch between each other in place, and experience a high degree of freedom of gameplay. Ride horses and bicycles, drive sports cars and helicopters to stay up late in beautiful nature.[

name: Joy and Me
description: Joy and me is a horror video game saga with events based on real events. Each chapter of the saga has things based on real events, both personal and paranormal problems, this saga has been developing for 7 years, and is practically almost ready for its premiere.

name: Shogi!
description: Shogi! Experience the ultimate 3D Shogi video game! Featuring stunning graphics, and a cutting-edge AI that brings the Japanese chess game to life like never before. Master the art of Shogi, a chess-like tabletop experience, and become a true champion of the popular strategic game.

name: Terrordactyl Carnivore
description:
Terrordactyl Carnivore is a thrilling dinosaur action adventure game! Fly your pterodactyl through a treacherous ravine to rescue lost cars from a prehistoric time-warp.

Defeat all pterodactyls by landing on top of them to advance to the next level. Munch all orbs before they turn into pterodactyls. Use the arrow keys to control your pterodactyl: up - gain altitude, left and right - forward and back. Use the space bar to breathe fire. Collect power ups to enhance your pterodactyl's flight (extra life, force field, super speed, destroy all, anti-gravity).

name: Scrapped
description: Get scrap, charge beacons and build unlockable robo-friends to survive!

name: Halo: Combat Devolved
description: Bungie's iconic first-person shooter, Halo: Combat Evolved, made its debut on the original Xbox in 2001, quickly redefining the shooter genre and what a multiplayer experience meant. Now, over two decades later, a passionate fan is undertaking a monumental project that is sure to excite any Halo fan.

name: A Day At the Track
description: A horse racing simulator where you bet your players money on the horse to win the race. If your horse wins you get paid. Run the other bots or joined twitch users out of money to be named the victor of the track.

name: Home Game 3
description:
This adventure-RPG features a bleak world full of secrets within secrets, hectic real-time combat and a custom inventory system of curious items and combinations.

It is about the hermit living with girl.

Exist at home or traverse dangerous realms, seeking Truths and age...

name: Metawork: Hotel Simulator
description: Metawork - Hotel Simulator: addictive game to build and manage your own hotel. Customize rooms and offer services to satisfy customers. Test business skills, attract customers, and respond to needs. Realistic graphics and gameplay mechanics. Unlock new features and watch hotel grow. Try now!

name: Ultimate Blackball
description: Ultimate Blackball is a simple addicting hyper-casual game that anyone can play.

name: Bullet Blaze
description: In Bullet Blaze, players take on the role of a heroic warrior with multiple bullet types, traversing obstacles and enemies, protecting peace and saving the world.

name: SoulJah Kingdom Rise
description: SoulJah Kingdom Rise is the first look at an upcoming 3rd Person shooter Action-Adventure franchise. Set in Jamaica in the year 2093, play as Akan and experience the first look at the world of SKR. Complete objectives, find secrets and clean the streets.

name: The Big Pond
description: Sail a small boat around in the pond

name: SoleSurvivor
description: SoleSurvivor is an open-world cooperative sandbox game for single and multiplayer. Players will experience the zombie apocalypse, they will have to deal with it to survive amid difficulties such as saving hostages, searching for resources, water and food, wild animals, survivors with weapons

name: Fall Guys: Neon Nightlife Pack
description: Turn up the neon and jack into cyberspace with these electrifying party punks!

name: Star Chaser
description: Have loads of fun chasing stars and a new high score, all while helping Make-A-Wish UK grant out-of-this-world life-changing wishes for children who need them.

name: Sudoku Master: Classic Sudoku
description: Classic sudoku - game for your brain! Improve your logical thinking.

name: Images Quiz
description:
Scratch away as little as possible to unearth the image beneath!
Test your brain, eyes, and fingers with this new and exciting picture quiz! A picture is hidden here . . . but a picture of what? Tap your screen to “scratch” away part of the covering, but be careful—you only have a limited number of scratches! Can you guess what the image is before running out?

name: Woven Words
description:
The Woven Words puzzle grids come in all different shapes and sizes, and when you’re done every row and every column will spell out complete words! Each game board is a mix of letters and blank tiles.
Can you find the right letters for the blank tiles so that every line spells a word both down and across?
The free app includes 6 basic puzzles so you can get your feet wet – and then 12 more challenging puzzles to test your skills. In addition, over five hundred more puzzles are available for purchase.
We’ve worked hard to make Woven Words fully accessible with VoiceOver.

name: Downwordly
description:
Downwordly is a word building game that challenges you to make the most out of the letters you have. Not all letters you see are playable! Use your intellect to find the best word you can make while also planning for the future.
Play against your GameCenter friends in turn-based multiplayer!
Play solo with an endless stack of letters!
Try searching for words in Puzzle mode!
Work your way through a new set of 5 layers of tiles every day in the Daily Challenge!
See how you stack up against your friends and the world on the leaderboards.

name: Slide to Spell
description:
Slide lines or columns of letters to form words spelled
either vertically or horizontally. You want to get the longest words possible.
The game has three modes: hard mode is a nightmare and in easy the game almost plays itself. Quite fascinating to watch, really.

name: 4x4 Offroader
description: 4x4 Offroader is a challenging 2D offroad racing game. The game contains 18 levels of increasing difficulty. Get the car from the start point to the finish line as fast as possible using the forward and back buttons in combination with the two rotate buttons. Sometimes objects must be moved along the way.

name: Touchgrind Scooter
description: Let us present the wildest Touchgrind game so far, Touchgrind Scooter, brought to you by the creators of Touchgrind BMX 2 and Touchgrind Skate 2. We took the core of the Touchgrind brand, listened closely to our players suggestions and feedback and created the most advanced and stunning Touchgrind game yet.

name: Drag Boat Speed Racing
description:
Build your engine the way you want to! Drag Boat Speed Racing features 100's of different part types resulting in unlimited combinations of ways to make your boat faster!
Drive your boat the way you want to! Weather, wind direction, and chop will affect how straight your hull flies.
Race against opponents across the USA in over 20+ unique locations! Compete for prizes and trophies to claim the title of "World Champion"

name: Solitaire 21 Card Sort
description:
Welcome to Solitaire 21 Card Sort, an offline game that requires no ads and collects no data.
The objective of the game is to sort cards and sum up the score to 21 in each round to clear the board. But watch out for the timer and lives - a wrong move costs a life! Make strategic moves to clear levels and unlock new cards, floors, and tables.
Features of Solitaire 21 Card Sort include a simple tap mechanism, a tutorial page to learn the rules of the game, earning game coins each round, hourly game coin rewards, an endless game mode, and a game score board.
To play Solitaire 21 Card Sort, simply sort the cards and add them up to 21. The game comes with a tutorial page - tap the ? to learn the rules of the game.
Get started with Solitaire 21 Card Sort today, a classic card game with a twist!

name: Tap Quiz
description:
Play Tap Quiz to test your knowledge, practice spelling and word finding skills.
Tap Quiz combines several word game genres and it can be played alone or with a room full of people.
Type answers using letters on the screen. Share the fun by asking family members and friends for help with the answers or the spelling.
As game progresses, questions gradually become more difficult. Please note that all letters on the screen including spaces and punctuation must be used to successfully complete each level.

name: Digit God
description:
How fast is your brain? How quick are your fingers? Digit God will tell you.
Digit God is a digit-oriented game designed for your i-Devices. Do math at anytime and anywhere!

name: Color Mumble
description:
Color Mumble is an Puzzle word game that keeps your brain sizzling.
Your objective:
unscramble as many five-letter words as you can with out running out of time. With two game modality, you will be entertained for hours. In Endless mode, you get 20 seconds to unscramble each word. In Time mode, solve as many words as you can in 3 minutes.

name: Slime Labs 3
description: Slime is marooned on planet Freezia and needs your help! Explore a frozen lab with slippery ice and new dangerous traps. Slime Labs 3 is a physics based platformer where you control a blob of green ooze that can squish, stretch, shrink, and get frozen. Perfect all the levels while collecting all the lost data disks.

name: Kabama
description:
Kabama is a turn-based board game for one or two players.
In Kabama, Players take turns to move, either by placing a counter of their own colour next to one of their existing counters, or by sliding any column or row of the board by exactly one square (touch and slide to do this).
If a player forms a 2x2 square of his / her own colour, those pieces are removed. The winner is the first player to remove all of their pieces from the board.

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Deadly Vice Weapon Skins
description: Light up the zombie-filled streets with the Deadly Vice Weapon Skins Pack, featuring 4 premium neon skins, one for each weapon.

name: The Cycle: Frontier - Howler Tamer Bundle
description: Let the competition know who's really the planet's apex predator with this Howler themed vanity pack. Each is precious, each is deadly.. Plus, a bonus of 1000 Aurum

name: The Cycle: Frontier - Vivid Party Style Pack
description: An exciting bundle of Vivid weapons and 'goldies' charms to bring your color and style down upon those dare to cross your path on Fortuna III. Plus, a bonus of 1000 Aurum!

name: Fortune Follow: The Mansion
description: An exciting game that will take you through an atmosphere of terror and suspense as you solve challenging puzzles to advance through different rooms.

name: The Cycle: Frontier - Authority Peacekeeper Pack
description: A fresh prospector with its various color versions to fit any taste. Suit up with your squad mates to show who's got style. Get your special Operative gear, equip your melee and hop on your drop pods. Plus, a bonus of 1000 Aurum

name: My Demon Wife
description: Beautiful woman became evil, powerful and immortal. She captured you, and made you her husband and slave. You land in a creepy castle with mummies and other monsters running around.

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Rat Packs Weapon Skins
description: Show those rat hordes that you fear no enemy with the Rat Packs Weapon Skins Bundle, featuring 4 premium rodent-themed skins, one for each weapon.

name: Lab Sorters
description: Sin descripción

name: Cities: Skylines - World Tour Bundle 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Density Limit
description: Welcome to the Unspace. Not gonna lie, it’s a little scary there, but it’s very attractive for scientists and kind of mysterious as well. But what is the limit of this space? What happened here and why does it even exist? Your mission will be to solve this case.

name: Doc McStuffins: School of Madicine
description: Doc McStuffins and her toy friends need help decorating the backyard in Create & Explore with Doc for VTech’s InnoTab systems. Play games that let you decorate banners, create costumes and make clay models of favorite characters. You can also play different instruments in a band with Doc’s friends. Along the way help Doc bring sick toys back to perfect health step-by-step. Open Doc’s Big Book of Boo-Boos to see each toy’s diagnosis and accompanying health tip. Then read the e-Book to learn what happens to Robot Ray when Hallie and Stuffy try to fill in for Doc in Diagnosis Not Even Close-is.

name: Doc McStuffins
description: Doc McStuffins and her friends are ready to open their clinic. Help them by playing card games, check-up and letter games that teach spelling, matching and memory skills in Mission Mode to unlock activities in Free Play Mode. Here, you can read "The Rip Heard 'Round the World" e-book, check out Doc's "Health Tips," take photos or become the "Prima Ballerina" as you earn awards. Doc and her stuffed pals are ready to play. Join them in their quest for fun and get your monthly check-up today.

name: Mr. Men & Little Miss: Adventures in Dillydale
description: The Mister Men, Little Miss Adventures for V Tech's MobiGo Touch Learning System utilise kid's favourite play patterns and infuse them with learning curriculum. Dance to the rhythms of DJ Mr. Messy, help Mr. Bump show off his dancing skills in the Pogo Stick Polka, or help Little Miss Sunshine get out of trouble by learning letters, numbers, colours and more and all with the touch of a finger.

name: Anvil Empires
description: Anvil is a massively multiplayer game where thousands of players work together to build empires, wage war, and conquer in a persistent online world. March alongside armies of players in massive melee battles and large scale sieges.

name: Mr. Men & Little Miss: Mr. Messy and the Missing Sock
description: Help solve the case of Mr. Messy's missing sock as well as learn sounds, syllables, rhyming and more!

name: Shrek Forever After
description: Sin descripción

name: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Mercuris' Chest
description: In this independent fangame from the Solarus Team, Link is brought to a mysterious kingdom where his help is needed to fight a giant bird who tries to steal a dangerous chest. Who is that mysterious bird warrior? Why does this place seem so familiar, but also so different? Enjoy a whole new journey in a huge kingdom full of mysteries, travelling and side quests.

name: Pixxelverse Online
description: Pixxelverse Online is a game that blurs the line between a social platform (MMOSP) and a roleplaying game (MMORPG). It is a place for people to socialize, build together, talk to each other, share video, and communicate in real-time. You and your friends can join together and go on adventures on a map that changes each year. By playing the game and exploring the world the users can obtain new cosmetics, furniture and weapons to enhance their characters and offer them a unique experience with a unique avatar customized by you.

name: Train Sim World 3: Loco Add-On Bundle 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Stellar Interface: Stellar Spacecrafts
description: Extend your gameplay with five new spacecrafts!

name: Gravewood High: Complete
description: Enjoy the complete version of the game including single-player and all future content. Gain access to new levels, puzzles, Teacher transformations, and player powers as they are released! This DLC also includes a digital art book located in the game's folder.

name: Gravewood High: Chapter 1
description: The first chapter of Gravewood High's single-player campaign. Several students have gone missing at Gravewood High. Together with your friend Erin, you have to confront the cunning Teacher and figure out what is behind the madness of Gravewood High.

name: Imperion
description: Space MMORTS from the makers of Travian.

name: Aztecs: The Last Sun
description: Aztecs The Last Sun is a simulator of building a city set between the 13th and 16th century CE. The player takes on the role of the ruler responsible for building and bringing to splendor the magnificent Tenochtitlan city-state. This amazing architectural wonder was historically located on an island in the middle of Lake Texcoco. This in itself will represent a technological and economic challenge for the player, who will have to provide food for his people and to maintain a permanent trade connection with the outside world.

name: Atom Antics
description: Professor Twiddie's Atom Antics is addictive, entertaining and fun puzzle game. It's the ultimate brain challenge for you. Proof that you are genius. Help Professor Twiddie. Touch and slide the atoms around the playfield to match the pattern shown on the small image.

name: Fat Cat & Airship
description: A fat cat wish to take an adventure to jump from one airship to another, but he need to try his best to jump into the center of the airship. It is easy when the airship has a low speed, but when airship run quickly, things will changed.

name: Parallel Room Escape
description:
Explore the new brain challenge puzzle & try to escape from this unknown spot.
We are introducing another interesting adventure mystery room escape game, so get ready for this new parallel room escape game 2020 and enjoy this interesting challenge from beginning to end.

name: Pixel Pro Winter Sports
description:
Pixel Pro Winter Sports is an incredibly addictive pixel-art makeover of your favourite wintertime sports.
Carve down the slopes in Downhill skiing, nip over to the Bobsled track for a hair-raising run, or aim for Olympic gold in the Slalom or Ski Jump.

name: Pingpon
description: Pingpon is a modern take on the classic Ping-Pong game. It takes place in a huge spherical 3D arena. Your main objective is to score goals by hitting the ball towards your opponent's side of the arena, and waiting for it to explode, as it touches the edge of the arena. It may sound easy, but you also have to outwit your AI-controlled opponent which is trained to block your attempts to score goals. Meanwhile, you also need to block your opponent's attempts to score goals.

name: Outer Space
description:
Come with us on an intergalactic journey!
Let's explore the fantastic intergalactic world of outer space!
Perfect for toddlers and little kids because there is no language knowledge needed to play this game!

name: Mad BalloonRider
description:
The player controls the balloon character in the game. there are black blocks, disposable items, and pink Bouncing things
that the Balloon must avoid or use to their advantage. Fill the bounce gauge to activate Fever mode and rocket your balloon to the sky. Whatever happens, You have to move up to the finish line.
If you do not have enough fuel on your way, do not forget to gather fuel items! It's that simple!

name: Kidblock
description:
Craft it, build it, blow it up. Share your creations online, or download thousands of words on the KB Community. Record your gameplay, include your face cam and upload to YouTube or Everyplay. Skin your character with custom skins and challenge your friends to a deathmatch with destructive rockets, lasers and swords.
Kidblock is: Building, exploring, world sharing, multiplayer, custom skins, mobs, rocket launchers, lasers, TNT, swords, crafting, mining, farming, protecting, gameplay recording and much more!

name: Spot Venture
description: It's a creative find differences game, full of eyeful puzzles and fun-filled challenges.

name: Tiny Legends: Saving Princess
description:
Another masterpiece game of Joy Joy Studio has finally arrived.
This is a decryption + puzzle game, the picture clear, simple operation, the best casual games in your spare time.
Fit with friends or family together to solve the puzzle.

name: WordWarrior
description: Sin descripción

name: Away to the Stars
description: A procedurally generated twin stick survival RPG. Battle, explore, loot, solve, communicate, live in an endless universe. Discover your past and travel your way to GAIA where humanity can be rebuilt or not...

name: Phantom Hunter
description: Unleash your inner Phantom Hunter in a supernatural 8-bit world! Battle against relentless ghosts, dodge a hail of bullets, and gather materials to unlock new classes and customize your abilities with powerful pendants. Will you rise to the challenge and become the ultimate ghost exterminator?

name: The Orphan
description: In The Orphan, you'll step into the shoes of Eric, a young orphan who has returned to the abandoned orphanage. As you explore its dark and twisted corridors, you'll encounter all manner of supernatural creatures and otherworldly horrors that will test your courage and your sanity.

name: When it rains, I want to disappear off somewhere
description: Sin descripción

name: Terra Nil: Deluxe Edition
description: The Terra Nil Deluxe Edition bundle includes a soothing 34-track OST by Meydän and a beautifully illustrated Digital Artbook.

name: Pump It Up Fiesta
description: Pump It Up is a music video game series developed and published by Andamiro, a Korean arcade game producer.

name: Sword of the Spirit
description: In this combat-focused RPG, you'll embark on a journey through perilous realms filled with dangerous creatures and challenging foes. Engage in fast-paced, strategic battles where every move counts as you wield a variety of weapons and master powerful abilities.

name: Journey Into Darkness
description: In an unknown environment, only this light can bring a little warmth, but the continuous decline of the battery is stripping away my sense of security, I have to escape!

name: Facewound
description: Sin descripción

name: Crossout: Biter Starter Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Crossout: Cleaner Starter Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Breakup Squad
description: A fast and asymmetrical team-based game for five players!

name: Jump and Roll
description: Sin descripción

name: Jumping Jacks
description:
Jumping Jacks will test your reflexes the hard way, despite its simple design.
Your ultimate impossible goal is to keep jumping over incoming enemies.

name: KleptoCats 2: Idle Furry Pets
description: KleptoCats 2, the sequel to the viral phenomenon, KleptoCats, brings back all your favorite feline friends along with some fresh new kitties. It's 2x more cute, 2x more fun, 2x more mysterious...and, yep you guessed it, 1337x pure PAW-someness!

name: Line Up: Dots!
description:
Find out the best route and connect the dots in order until the end of the line, but don't forget to collect the stars at the right time!
Play freely hundred levels, beginning with the easiest to the most challenging. Each level has several ways to be solved, use your logical reasoning and try to collect all the stars of each world!

name: Lost Oddies
description:
Help the Oddies get home by puzzling them towards their symbol.
But be aware, Oddies of the same color will always follow one another!
If you move one green Oddie to the left, all other green Oddies will also move to the left!
This makes Lost Oddies a simple, yet brain twisting puzzle with 6 different Oddie behaviors and many interactive elements to use!

name: Lulu Fighter for LOL
description: This is a fangame for all users, and the only requirement is your fantastic technique.

name: Magimon Adventures
description: Jump into the amazing world of monsters and tamers in this action-packed mix of RPG and gem shooting puzzle gameplay. Prepare for an exciting encounter with creatures ranging from cute to wild in this gem puzzle game where you fight, tame and collect fantasy creatures!

name: Minecart Chase
description: Harrison Jones, a world famous archeologist, has found mystic 'Frozen Diamond' in the shadow of Temple. but army of darkness want it too. When he escape from temple, though, army of darkness also found him, Now it's up to him caring 'Frozen Diamond' From temple to UFO before it's too late. He has a mine cart with speed and diamond energy will give you boost speed.

name: Moby's Revenge
description: Evil Humans captured poor Moby in an aquarium. After rescuing Moby he gets his Revenge and starts his jellycious journey. Moby uses the waste of the Humans as a Tool against them. Collect Starfishes and upgrade his special abilities to get even higher and higher scores.

name: Rise to Surface
description:
Avoid the rocks and pick up the treasures.
Help the little monster in the bubble to rise up to the surface in this action packed game.

name: Rocket Space Ship Frontier
description:
Rocket Space-Ship Frontier is a unique rocket game suitable for all ages! It is one of the best one-tap games you can find!
Can you hear the engine running? Get ready for a party from outer space! Take a step outside of Earth and begin to play!

name: Fitz 2
description: Be the first to discover Fitz 2: Magic Match 3 Puzzle. Bright colors, enhanced gameplay, amazing power-ups and the same addictive game mechanics await for you in this fancy installment of the hit match 3 puzzle game.

name: Shock Hop
description: How long can you survive the experiment?!

name: Stars Blast
description:
Choose your preferred control mode, game mode and musics.
Make use of the bonus items to get higher scores and challenge world records.
Share your score to varies social networks. Challenge your friends.

name: The 8th Son? A.R.
description:
Scenario is based on a new Anime-derived original story directed by Y.A!
As the mysterious protagonist of Another Reincarnation, players set out on an adventure to save a world on the brink of destruction with Wendelin and his friends.

name: Thumb Buggy
description: Thumb Buggy is always ready for action! Collect items to score as many points as you can in "Score Attack" mode, grab coins as quickly as possible in "Coin Dash", and become the ultimate striker in "Goal Rush". Challenge your friends and family, and compete against others from across the world! Vroooom!

name: Train Station: Rail Transport
description:
Join hundreds of thousands train dispatchers, collect thousands of trains and learn real-life stories about them.
Manage your station, earn resources by managing transport of passengers and gain various materials with freight trains. Use them to build up your train station and to purchase more passenger and cargo trains! Become a railway magnate in this awesome train simulator, finish hundreds of achievements, ship cargo to contract partners to gain awesome rewards. Cooperate with your friends to become a railroad tycoon, or compete with them in leaderboards to show off the power of your train fleet.

name: Worldquiz
description:
Test and improve your knowledge about the world! Play in multiple singleplayer games or challenge your friends and other players online.
You know where to find New York? Even locating the Mount Everest is easy for you? But where is Timbuktu?
Prove yourself in 60 questions around the world in the level game, find the right balance between speed and accuracy in the timeattack game or repeat your weakest answers in the training mode.

name: ChasingCube
description:
Control the cubes to avoid every triangles.
Easy yet hard, how fast will you react.

name: Cat Pong!
description:
A cat is traced, linked and put out.
Prettily, a very refreshing puzzle game appeared.
The operation is easy, but the game is deep.

name: Cat Game
description: This is a zen like game where you have your tea, enjoy the game soundtracks and be with your kittens. Find the differences between them...

name: Color Tower
description: Build a great tower of colored boxes!

name: Brick Rage
description:
Harness your rage and your focus to defeat this non-stop, addictive and challenge game.
Swipe to direct the missing bricks into place,column by column, demolishing rows before the wall crashes down on you.

name: 9PM Football Managers
description:
Be the Best among all Managers
Leave everything behind you and build up your Football Club in a whole new way.
It’s the one and only mobile game that you play with your real-life effort.

name: GoGo Tap! Fighter
description:
Hurry! Go outside and beat up villains and defeat their boss using your mighty skills in order to complete this exciting fast mission!
Aside from the “Normal Mode”, this game also has another mode, the “Danger Mode”.
In this mode, the view becomes smaller and less visible, therefore the chances of failing increases.

name: God of Track
description: Go further, play more and never give up!

name: Glyph
description:
Glyph is a graceful, mind-bending puzzle game where lines making chain reactions are the way to achieving the highest scores.
Coupled with a soothing and relaxing soundtrack, Glyph is easy to play but difficult to master as you get to grips with making the decisions of which Glyphs to pop and which to mutate.

name: Glassfish Bomb
description: Tap Tap all the flashing glassfish balls!!! Be careful of the Bombs they are explosive!!!

name: Gear for Heroes
description:
Train and hire blacksmiths so we can equip our warriors with the best weapons we can craft. As you improve your idle forge, our troops will get epic gear to put in their inventory slots - new armour for health, new swords for attack, new staves for magic.
Is this an RPG? Is this strategy? Is it idle? All three at the same time. Raise your empire by equipping your soldiers, and let them train and raise health while you’re afk. Your blacksmiths will work tirelessly to equip the hero and warriors with epic loot so they can go on mighty quests to forge empires.

name: Dragon Vita
description: How about adopting a dragon? Play Dragon Vita to hatch, raise and breed awesome 3D dragons and build the ultimate Dragon Park to brag about!

name: Null Matter
description: Experience the soothing challenge of Null Matter, an abstract puzzle game that tests your logic skills. Your goal is to eliminate all particles from the scene by merging matter and antimatter particles. With 50 levels to complete and an infinite game mode, you can enjoy hours of gameplay. Use multiple types of elements to change the properties of the particles and solve the puzzle. The game features a dark and bright theme that can be inverted, along with simple and easy controls.

name: One Line 3D
description: A simple, but challenging puzzle for your brain! Fill in all of the blocks in one line. Drag or tap on the blocks to fill them.

name: Real Monster Truck Parking
description: Drive 8 amazing Monster Trucks in exciring Events & Arenas! Enjoy tons of new Missions with our FREE “Monster Content” update and prove yourself as a stunt driver!

name: Animo Stars Arena
description: A new take on third person shooters with crazy mech customizability. Hop into your battle ready machine and start raking up rewards in competitive matches or compete with your friends in custom ones.

name: Experiment: One
description: Psychological horror in which you will have to try on the role of a psychologist on a helpline, as well as be drawn into a series of strange events taking place in the office.

name: Doge Simulator
description: Doge wants to destroy! Doge wants this whole damn city to be destroyed! Smash the shops, cafes and even the damn palm trees! In our game you play as Doge, and you have to destroy, smash and break!

name: Spaceship Racer: Portal
description: Sin descripción

name: High Für 3 Score
description: In this game as an arrow-like character you're trapped in a cannabis frenzy. The goal is to dodge all the spirits that come your way. Through the effects box, you can complete the run with unique effects. Along the way, you can also unlock cool stuff to look extra good on the next intoxicating run or compete against different looking spirits. Weekly you have the chance to land on the display with the top 10 best, who have the most achieved high score of that week.

name: Save District 3
description: "Save District 3" is an action sci-fi game. You will control a young lady to save her homeland.

name: Grow and Smile: For Balling
description: The ball is round and can become bigger or smaller. Its attack depends on your skill. May be very tired, but happiness comes with you...

name: Girls Bus Adventure
description: A thrilling adventure in an open-world environment! Drive a cool van as you search for the hottest models and up-and-coming actresses. With stunning graphics and engaging gameplay, you'll be hooked from the start. Experience the thrill of the hunt like never before!

name: Puym: Lake
description: Click on the skate, aim at the garbage can and manage to throw away a minimum of masks to reach the goal ! It's up to you to solve each riddle! All around the lake, visit 100 emblematic places and discover their stories. You will also learn a lot about the decomposition of waste in nature.

name: Robot Lawn Mower
description: Step into the exciting world of robotics with this satisfying robot grass cutting game

name: Chaos Coming
description: "Chaos is Coming" is a personal independent development of the Cthulhu Mythos-style card roguelike game. In the game, the player will face various mysterious and crazy creatures and events, collect powerful relics to drive away monsters, and escape the domain before their mind is corrupted.

name: Blind and Schizophrenic
description: Fornicate with hookers, smoke weed, or just sit at home collecting welfare, how will you spend your life as a blind old man with schizophrenia? Can you survive even one day as this poor, decrepit wretch? Or will you show the world that it should pay attention to irate old farts with nothing to lose?

name: Ascendant's Roguelike
description: A fantasy based roguelike. Ascend and slay endless hordes or monster while gaining the abilities of each creature you slay.

name: Finger Is 300 Bugs
description: "Finger is 300 bugs" is a wave game where you have to destroy bloodthirsty insects attacking your breakfast. Use boxes, traps, and moves to protect your belongings and survive as long as possible.

name: Karpov
description: "Karpov" is a visual horror novel shrouded in mysticism.Do you see THEM? Sneaking around in the shadows. Hiding their motives. You are far from the first to confront them. Are you sure you're strong enough? How presumptuous. Take your time. One false step and you won't be able to go back.

name: Squad Game
description: Squad Game is a unique game that combines side-scrolling adventure with quarter-view turn-based strategic battles.

name: Tower of Traceability
description: You control a magic tower floating in the sky, falling from the sky against enemies coming from all sides, choosing the right weapon mix for different enemies, using health and mana in a planned way, reducing their wear and gain more rewards.

name: Eye Uv Eve
description: Multi-gun bullet heaven arena arcade survivor madness. Wield 14 guns at once and destroy hordes of enemies. Die, upgrade, return, destroy, repeat.

name: Noob: Les Sans-Factions - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Park Beyond: Day-1 Admission Ticket Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Storm
description: Sonic Storm is a Sonic fan game that takes place after Sonic CD. This game takes inspiration from Y2K and street culture, from its stylised shading and user interface to its heavy focus on grinding and maintaining combos.

name: Pokémon Vanguard
description: Enter Ayrei, A region split into four separate quadrants, each blooming with life.

name: Cowboys & Rustlers
description: Tear-jerking story about a friendship between a man and a horse. Face life’s headwinds with the help of universal tools of communication - revolvers, lasso, emotional intelligence and dynamite. Search for the sense of spittoons (and life) on the prairies where mean words ricochet as hard as bullets.

name: Grand Sanctuary: Troth of Angel
description: Sin descripción

name: Rival Gears
description: Sin descripción

name: Dream Land
description: This is a pixel art style open world survival adventure game. Player wake up in a strange dream world, start an unknown journey. Player need to acquire resources through foraging, hunting, mining, fighting,etc.,to build bases, to craft equipment, to cook foods, and to develop himeself/herself.

name: Ninja Survivors Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Spider Evolution
description: Sin descripción

name: Gorufoo
description: A Golf-like sport for the new generation.

name: Spies Spies Spies
description: This is a pixel-style role-playing game with exploration and adventure. weapon upgrade, random state, random skill, random prop, armor upgrade, store, alien copy, spy, fog, civilian kill, escape, super magic outfit, roguelike, poisonous fog, trap, automatic aiming, infinite refresh.

name: The Penguins of Madagascar: The Helmet
description: When Kowalski invents a helmet that turns thoughts into actions, it’s only a matter of time before King Julien tries to get his hands on it. Once in control of the helmet, King Julien turns up the power to such a level that he can’t control it, and it’s up to the Penguins to find a way to stop it before chaos takes over the zoo.

name: Super Mario Solarshine
description:
Experience the Galaxy in a whole new way!
Super Mario Solarshine is a completely new adventure that brings many of your favourite Galaxy levels into Super Mario Sunshine.

name: Ben 10 Omni-Charged
description: Ben 10: Omni-Charged is a 5-minute, 1-3 Player VR Cooperative Multiplayer game that puts players in a Powertrix suit armed with overpowered alien abilities. Suit up and save the city from Vilgax and his robotic army.

name: Stay Alive
description: Stay Alive is a game with simple gameplay, designed in retro pixel art style, with elements of mythology and roguelite. Sometimes running away isn't the solution, but sometimes you shouldn't even look back, and giving up isn't always the end.

name: Day at the Races
description: The aim of this "light-hearted" horse racing game is to win enough money to purchase, maintain and enter your horse in the prestigious Day at the Races Cup, held on the 5th race of the final day. Good luck!

name: Friendly Premonition
description:
A murder just took place in the town of Greenvale, and it's affected everyone. You play as a psychically-attuned stranger to town who has a feeling that there's more to some of these people than meets the eye. Lucky for you, you're charming enough that people trust you with a whole host of secrets.

Visit various different locations around Greenvale and talk to the cast. Collect illustrated trading cards after getting to know people through dialogue options. View a range of familiarly odd items with new descriptions. Even flirt with the people you've made friends with, if you're so inclined.

Friendly Premonition is a talking sim where you can meet every character from the original game and listen to them talk your ear off about a range of interests. Once they've run out of specific topics, they'll eagerly share whatever thought enters their head. A select number of characters even have special mechanics for you after you've talked to them enough, so make sure you check back.

name: RoboCop
description: Game Boy Advance port of RoboCop.

name: Dunk Tower
description:
Do you like basketball games? Do you like casual games?
Then find the two together in Dunk Tower! An incredible, challenging and addictive game!
Score baskets and overcome the challenges before the water covers your tower!
And more, have you thought about play basketball with a soda or a barrel? Collect all crazy skins for your basketballs!

name: Paper Champion
description:
Deliver papers to your customers with this fast-paced, fun, and addictive game.
Test your skills by trying to deliver the most papers without crashing into oncoming traffic!
Time your throw perfectly and the paper will land on the customers doorstep for more points!

name: Rage Racing 3D
description: Like Parkour? Or Racing games? Enjoy them all in our game, this is the only chance in market.

name: Death Tour
description: Deliver highly valuable cargo, but watch out: you’re being hunted down. Drive through the racy storyline at full speed, reveal the secret of the stolen briefcase and revenge a gang of cold-blooded assassins.

name: Stone of Destiny
description:
Brand new Chinese style match-3 puzzle game from Fangtang!
Challenge your skills across 9 areas and 73 levels in the the definitive puzzle game. Gain the help of mythical Chinese creatures and tools to discover your destiny!
Can you find the ultimate truth?

name: Letteral
description: Letteral is a beautiful and clever word game, that you can play for free against your friends or anybody in the world. But be aware, word wizards; Only with a superior strategy will you be able to beat your opponents.

name: Rat vs. Cat
description: Mr. Joey Mouse has a very sweet and little dream of filling his hole with all the cheese of this world.

name: Monster Busters: Hexa Blast
description: Do you think you have what it takes to match the same colored monsters, and save the gingerbread cookie friends? Monster Busters: Hexa Blast is a brilliant match three puzzle game – a brand new yet classic match 3 style game with a hexagonal twist. If you love fun casual games and match three games, you are bound to love Hexa Blast.

name: Rainbow Splash
description: Discover what’s at the end of the rainbow in the new addictive puzzle game, Rainbow Splash! Seemingly simple in concept, this game will test your puzzle solving skills. As you progress through the game, you’ll reveal new acts each with a new twist. Finally when you’re ready, try the challenge mode to truly put your skills to the test.

name: Crazy One
description: Play with friends and share the fun with family. Challenge real players online or computer players in real time. Compete against top players worldwide. Chat with other players using emoji and send each other gifts.

name: Swipe: Maze solver
description:
A new type of one hand playable maze game!
Touching colors and piano musics will get your eyes and ears.

name: Love Connection!
description: Here you will be a star! Take advantage of your passion for love to connect all the graphics and absorb them. The more graphics you can connect and absorb, the higher score you will get. Come to challenge yourself!

name: Sp:In
description:
Control the Nuggle’s spaceship with a single tap and collect the Light Energy needed to fight their biggest threat: a supermassive black hole that is slowly absorbing the Nuggle’s Planet.
But be careful, it may be harder than it seems! You will find many obstacles to overcome in your journey through space such as asteroids, deadly dust clouds or radioactive zones. Not everything is as it seems and you’ll need to hone your skills to master your spaceship’s speed and movements!

name: Monster Pet Shop
description: Run your own Monster Pet Shop that grows, exhibits, and sells fantastic magical creatures. Play with, care and feed your creatures to maximize happiness. Happy creatures award more money when you find them good homes. Customize your Monster Pet Shop with three different habitats – Dirt, Grass and Water, and unlock ever more wonderful creatures.

name: Coal Burnout
description: Beat your competition in Multiplayer PVP by establishing a quick get away. In Coal Burnout, you'll be able to use a variety of trains to get ahead of your competition. Get Coal Burnout today!

name: Trench Racer
description: Race through trenches and underground tunnels blasting your way through enemy strong-holds with an array of powerful weapons. Reach the wormhole gate to escape before you're destroyed or your craft runs out of energy.

name: Terrella
description:
Opposites attract as you create your own gravity and anti-gravity using four colors. Find the best solution to guide your way through each world as quickly as possible. Watch out for the glowing obstacles. While they look pretty, they are not friendly! Play your friends in real-time with the multiplayer mode or challenge them to beat your scores.

It’s a race against time to set new high scores for yourself or beat the scores of your friends. Terrella’s companion, Boost, can help her out of a sticky situation. When timed just right, Boost can also help Terrella make it through a level faster to get the top score.

name: Rapid Roller
description: Roll in a minimalistic, colorful world and see how far you can travel! Roll over jump pads for extra score. But don't hit the walls or spikes!

name: Tap Tap Driver
description:
Tap Tap Driver is a fun and challenging endless driving game. Drive your car along the zigzag road in a dynamically generated city. Tap the screen to steer the car left and right. Compete with your friends and compare or beat their highest score.
Tap Tap Driver will test your agility, alertness, and timing. It is a good eye and hands coordination exercise.

name: The Reacher
description: The Reacher is a platform game with different aspects in it. Run, slide and swing for reaching the goal. It is designed for speed runs.

name: Ultimate Skate
description:
The most adrenaline inducing skateboarding game ever. If you want to skate in the most hardcore and fun way, this is the game for you! This simulator lets you build your own custom board and skate around different parks and shred objects.
Choose between 30 different boards and 9 different truck varieties to show your true skater personality!

Use swipes to preform tricks and push the board forward with natural ease. You can also record video replays and send them to your friends! This app has everything you need to become a legendary skater.
Loved by skaters all over the world.

name: Adventures in Equica: Unicorn Training
description:
Master powerful magic, venture through dungeons, and explore the monster-filled forest of Equica! Clover is the unicorn apprentice of Grand Swirllock the Bearded. She needs to learn the 10 basic combat spells every mage must master to survive fights against the monsters of Equica.

Traverse deadly dungeons to unlock more spells and extend your life energy! Beat all the dungeon bosses to prove you’re tough enough to take on any dangerous quest!

name: WinterCraft: Forest Survival
description:
You are in a winter forest and trying to survive at any cost! Can you survive and find your missing father?

WinterCraft is a survival game set in a winter forest where you will face dangers in a vast free world. Get resources, set up a camp, hunt wild animals and explore snow-covered forests! Every day in winter survival can be the last day on earth!
Many adventures await you: story quests, survival in the forest, exploration, hunting, gathering and crafting. You will have to learn a lot to survive: get food, melt snow, hunt animals and keep a fire!

name: Fearz!
description: Fearz! is a fast-paced game of observation in which all players play at the same time.

name: Cosmic Dungeon
description: Cosmic Dungeon is a rogue-like game set in space, where players can explore unique dungeons filled with challenging enemies and treasure. With an array of different items and weapons to collect, players must strategically navigate the dangers of each level to progress deeper into the dungeon.

name: Beeknighted
description:
On a stormy evening a marauding troll absconds with a beehive while being pursued by hunters. While the hunter's plans go awry, the troll stumbles into their pitfall trap, dragging the unfortunate bee with him. Separated from the broken fragments of her hive and stranded during a storm, the bee must find temporary refuge in the caves below the Bugbear Antfort and escape to safety.

Meet friends and foes, discover treasures and traps, and traverse the dangerous caverns in this adventure inspired by Nintendo 64-era classics.

name: Mortal Trace
description: Online PvP 3D "snake" game. Avoid yours's and your opponents' growing tail or "Trace" and be the last left in the arena while trying to cut off and trap your opponents with your Trace.

name: The World Hockey Championships
description:
Play a competitive real-time​ hockey game! Position your player to take your best shot and make epic saves in real time to become the next World Hockey Champion!
Play in multiplayer or single game mode, competing with people around the world in real time to win The World Hockey Championships.

name: Armed Air Forces
description: Armed Air Forces offers all-embracing combat flight simulation experience on mobile devices. Finally you can play PC quality combat game anywhere and anytime you wish.

name: Real Cricket™ 16: English Bash
description:
From the makers of Real Cricket comes the excitement of the English T20 Bash!
Guide your favorite English T20 team to the top and win the biggest cricketing domestic crown in Britain.

Pick your favorite team full of superstars and compete against the best!
Be amongst the game's finest, use the entire arsenal of 27 cricketing shots to experience the most dynamic and realistic representation of our favorite sport on your mobile devices.

name: Built for Speed
description: Built for Speed is the best retro-racing game available for your mobile device today! Beat your friends and the top players on player made tracks; rise to the top of the league to prove you're the champion.

name: Golf Odyssey
description: Get a hole in one and unlock new courses on this relaxing yet challenging golf game!

name: Hello Princess
description:
A maze game set within a castle.
You have to solve the maze, reach the princess and save her.

name: Tiny Troopers: Global Ops - Digital Deluxe Bundle
description:
