The Tiny Troopers: Global Ops Digital Deluxe Edition Includes:

- Tiny Troopers: Global Ops
- Tiny Troopers: Joint Ops
- The ‘Tiny Tales’ Comic Book
- The Tiny Troopers: Global Ops Original Soundtrack

name: Chronicon Complete
description: Sin descripción

name: ForbiddenWord
description: Let the other person say the forbidden word! A psychological chat game that takes care of your own forbidden word and draws out the other player's forbidden words!

name: T.D.Z. 3: Dark Way of Stalker
description: Atmospheric Stalker adventure in the post-Apocalypse world!

name: Night of Spirits
description: Night of Spirits is an individual or online horror game for up to 4 players, where the main objective is to hunt down the ghosts that haunt the city.

name: Gothic Platformer Games Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Birds Blitz
description: Sin descripción

name: Align 12
description:
Move-Align Puzzle!
Creative Puzzle!
Different Puzzle!

name: Ludo Live!: Heroes and Strategy
description: Play a brand new, innovative game of Ludo with mythical heroes and epic battles. Plan your moves. Cast Spells. Decide which battles to fight and which heroes to play with. In Ludo Live! roll the dice and make decisions to destroy all your opponents with your heroes and win the game.

name: Chezz
description:
Play fast chess in an all-new way!
Chezz breaks the rules to create the fastest, most frantic new way to play the classic board game.

Challenge yourself in a game that lets you move all the pieces at the same time. Fight quick online PVP battles in real time with other players, or solve hundreds of levels in adventure mode. Pieces change on each game board and can be upgraded. Fast like checkers, intense like chess. Play the ultimate board to action game conversion. Become the ultimate king or queen and join the Chezz revolution today!

name: Chart1647
description: Chart1647 is a classic rhythm game developed over many years and is a 4k game similar to Stepmania. It features a fully customized set of levels, importers from most modern SM formats and more!

name: RedCat: De Duistere Dierendiefstal
description: RedCat travels in a UFO along the five continents and looks for all kinds of mammals, birds, reptiles, amphibians and fish.

name: Friday Night Funkin: vs. Jeff
description: Sin descripción

name: Raptor Rush
description: The game features a dynamic day and night system that adds a new level of challenge and excitement to the game. You'll be able to see the stunning visuals change as you progress through each level, keeping you engaged and immersed in the game.

name: Before We Leave: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Magbot: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Core-Blast
description: Find core of the same type that are close to each other and click on them to blast.

name: Jump Jump Cyberpunk
description: A strategy game where driving a ball you will have to overcome countless obstacles to reach the exit and move to the next level. You will find led levels full of jumps, free falls, spins,teleports, obstacles and music that will immerse you in the game. A perfect combination to enjoy, are you ready?

name: Binarion
description: Improve your intellect with this unique puzzle game where you solve delta grid to find two binary prime factors from a given multiplication product.

name: Four-Knight
description: Four-Knight is a simple four-in-a-row. Act strategically on the simple rules and aim for your victory.

name: Fobia ...Worse Than Fear.
description: An adventure of exploration, intrigue and psychological terror of great originality.

name: Sky Symphony
description: Welcome to Sky Symphony, the ultimate side-scrolling flying adventure! Take flight in a stunning, immersive world filled with endless obstacles, challenges, and opportunities to collect points.

name: Hidden Object: Mystery of Mysteries of the Aztecs
description: Everyone wants to take part in an interesting adventure in search of ancient civilizations. Do not miss your chance, not everyone has in life! You'll have to show attentiveness, speed of thinking to solve the difficult but very interesting problems. And only after that you can see the beauty of the ancient world, which has hidden waiting for many centuries! Do not waste your time and forward - to new adventures!

name: Deadly Soccer
description:
Dear players, we draw your attention to the unique opportunity to see an abundance of various evil spirits in a soccer game.
In the heat of the lost souls' tournament, the accumulation of a large amount of immortal substance created to something which installed itself into the soccer ball, so that everything it touched started coming to life – from the lifeless bodies in the cemetery to the scarecrows in the gardens... All the revived ones demonstrated an unquenchable thirst for the game.

name: CoupButat
description:
Enjoy the story of little pigs and wolves, which you've probably never seen!
The Fairy Tale of little pigs and wolf... is familiar to everybody in the world.
But this game's story seems a little different to the story we all know...
Complete the game, and look forward for the original ending!

name: CoogyLoop
description: Easy rules, easy to use, easy to get addicted to. Coogyloop is all about making sure your mind is quick and your fingers quicker.

name: Jumpy Rooftop
description:
Running, jumping, and sprinting is what Jumpy Rooftop is all about!
Unlock all 32 or more hero characters, including a fireman, policeman, gym junkie, robber and more! Collect heroes during endless mode and earn bonus gems just for playing!
You can run through night and day, good and bad weather, rain hail or snow! Chickens, fireworks, water spouts and all sorts of crazy stuff will cross your road. Dodge missiles and other nasty stuff falling from the sky! If it's not a bird, it'll probably kill you!

name: Jungle Jammy
description:
Swing endlessly through the jungle and throw bananas at eagles and sleepy snakes. Bananas are great for survival and your health.
Go bananas!

name: Cave Swing
description:
Falling into a cave is never fun, but things quickly change when you discover that the cave is full of diamonds!
Swing from side to side and collect as many diamonds as possible. Unlock awesome characters with unique abilities, but whatever you do, do not hit the cave walls.

name: Archery Tournament
description: Discover this top free archery game with tournament mode, great performance, small install size, and amazing features!

name: Ark Bubble
description: Ark Bubble is similar to brick breaker genre with some cool adaptations. Instead of moving a paddle, you draw lines on the screen to avoid the ball to scape in the bottom of screen. You can not draw infinite number of lines, they are limited but you can buy more ones with your points.

name: Mimpi Hidden Objects
description:
Meet Mimpi, the cutest puppy ever! Help him find hidden objects in a colorful world - in the craziest dream a dog can ever have!
Travel through seven diverse lands that Mimpi visited on his original quest to find his master.

name: Mini Tennis
description: Pick your racket and choose your ball. Get ready to go onto the court in this brand-new tennis game! Experience tennis like never before in this fresh and easy-to-play game. In Mini Tennis, you can enjoy a casual gameplay experience that still remains loyal to the original game. It’s time for you to get a standing ovation from the crowd in the arenas and courts, score some amazing points, and build the strongest tennis legend that ever existed!

name: My Brother is a Superhero
description: Luke is a comic-mad eleven-year-old who shares a treehouse with his geeky older brother, Zach. Luke's only mistake is to need a wee right at the wrong moment. While he's gone an alien gives his undeserving, never-read-a-comic-in-his-life brother superpowers, then tells him to save the universe. Luke is massively annoyed about this, but when Zach is kidnapped by his arch-nemesis, Luke and his friends only have five days to find him and save the world...

name: Shadow Land
description:
One day, the world suddenly lost its colour…
All the colour in the world was taken by a monster that came from nowhere!
The colourful world became monochromatic…
In these times, we need the help of the legendary puppeteer!

name: The Light Box
description: This challenging and unique puzzle game is easy to pick up but has hours of gameplay.

name: The Lions Knight
description: The Lions Knight is a game designed to the players who love SRPG game. A large number of 3D heroes and monsters! The battle is tactfully and simple operation; And the other leisure playing - farm and mining. we provide a strategy and relaxed game experience for player experience.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Summer Look Costume Set
description: Summer outfits for Atelier Ryza 3! Adds 7 summer costumes, one each for Ryza, Klaudia, Lent, Tao, Empel, Lila, and Bos.

name: Romantic Shooter
description: Romantic Shooter is an erotic shmup game where you'll be able to destroy the girls clothes!

name: Eightrun
description: Eightrun is an intense, minimalist game of fast reflexes, in which the player tries to dodge patterns of obstacles while moving down an endless, octagonal tunnel.

name: Legendary Realms: A Fantasy World Odyssey
description: Legendary Realms: A Fantasy World Odyssey is a multiplayer sandbox adventure game. Create your own character, select classes, and take on quests to earn rewards and level up. With a range of equipment and multiplayer options, it's an immersive experience that will keep you engaged for hours.

name: Ballsvoid
description: Difficult game of skill and reflexes where you have to help the character to escape. Take your controller and prepare to die many times.

name: Dungeon Legend
description: This is a casual breakout game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. .

name: Brain Hole Girls
description: Can a perfect body and a smart brain coexist?

name: Do You See Sparky?
description: Do You See Sparky? is a first-person co-op horror game for 1-4 players with a social deduction elements. Collect clues, solve puzzles, cheat to catch a monster that you can't see, but your friends can.

name: Rocket Control
description: This game is an extremely simple 2D action game where you launch, control, and land rockets. The rules are simple: ascend to an altitude of 1000 meters, start the descent, and then land back at the original launchpad.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Thornweaver Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Burning Tracks
description:
Get airborne, flip over, climb mountains, drift and more in this realistic 3D off road racing game.
With many different terrains and maps, face off with other off road racers and try to beat them to the finish line.
Turn with a tilt of your device, floor the gas with a touch of a finger, drift by touching the handbrake and touch the brake to slow down.

name: Ball til You Fall
description:
Ball til You Fall is a lighthearted basketball shooter with attitude.
Swipe the ball at the hoop to score, but beware! Missed shots come with a penalty. If you hit the backboard, you risk pushing the hoop off of the edge!
Collect gems to win new balls with mysterious new abilities that can give you that competitive edge.

name: Blades Away
description:
Physics based, 2D blade throwing simulation game with lots of unique blades to collect and master.
Knife throwing has never been this easy to pick up and this challenging to fully master. Throw axes, knives, swords, ninja stars and other blades from all across the world. Huge rewards for skill and perception.

name: MLB Tap Baseball 2023
description: MLB Baseball comes to your phone with the MLB Tap Baseball mobile game. Manage a dream team of real MLB players from the most current rosters and travel to authentic ball parks. Play nine innings of gripping baseball action and power up your team to help your club rank at the top of the leaderboard! Tap to swing and hit a home run with simple controls - but keep your eye on the ball!

name: American Football: Guns & Balls
description: Sin descripción

name: King of Sopio
description: The Sopio family increases with King Of Sopio!

name: Putt Golf
description: Play the ultimate fun Putt Golf game. The game is very simple, you just have to judge the angle of the ground and tap at the right time to putt the ball.

name: Neon Sling
description: Drag the large neon ball on the sling line and release it to shoot the targets!

name: Oran's Table
description:
Oran challenges you to take a seat at his table in this thoughtful puzzler.
Use the unique movements of each piece to cover every portal. You'll need to step, slide, jump, swap, shift, mimic and connect your way to the solution.
You must think creatively: pieces working in harmony create paths greater than the sum of their parts.
Controls are simple. Tap to reveal range, and tap again to move.
Features over 120 handmade puzzles, 6 unique pieces, and a few surprises which only the most devoted players will discover.
Play the 1st 16 puzzles free, and pay only once to play the rest.

name: Recess Riot
description:
From the creators of the cult hit game Super Mega Worm, comes a new and fresh arcade game.
Recess Riot is an unique and challenging Action/Arcade game comprised of multiple game modes.
Jump! mode is a timing based jump rope game with a twist. Ropers will change rope speed and patterns. Ropers will also shift left and right to keep the players on their toes. Advance stages will require players to jump rope and dodge incoming objects simultaneously.

name: Swim Meet
description: See if you can beat the best in 5 Olympic-style Swimming Events. Use finger gestures that are modeled on the actual swimming motion used in each event.

name: Let's Go Run
description:
Be willing to end the 30 missions and you wander in a popular Suq?
And the removal of restrictions on your friends in the game to be able to play their own.

name: Where Is My Crown?
description:
The kingdom host the biggest party of the year to celebrate the king inauguration. But, the king had too many honey and lost his crown....
Where is my crown? is a new procedurally generated deduction game and you can play it anywhere only needing your smart logic and thinking.
Where is my crown? is a deduction game where players must explore and investigate other character to find the crown.

name: XeeWar
description:
XeeWar is an online 2-player turn-based strategy war game where players fight for control over the battlefield by destroying enemy units and capturing bases.
Each player take turns building units, advancing on the battlefield, capturing bases and eventually engaging in combat. Each combat unit has its own strengths and weaknesses, and are affected by the terrain. Use advanced tactics to outsmart your opponent!
XeeWar uses the Elo-rating system (often used in Chess). Your rating changes after each match, based on your opponents rating. Gain enough rating and you will start gaining Ranks and climb the leaderboard!
When you start playing XeeWar you have the rank 'Recruit'. If your rating gets high enough you will recieve a new rank. There are 7 ranks total, with 'General' as the highest rank.
Good luck on the battlefield commander!

name: The Riddler
description: Think you're clever? Prove it with an enigmatic AI, the ultimate master of riddles beyond imagination.

name: Causeway
description: Create intricate and satisfying road systems in tiny utopian cities Causeway is a minimalist road building sim where you help futuristic hover vehicles find their destinations by building roadways to connect different highways. Get ready to build the roadways of the future!

name: Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training
description: Train your professional skills in Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

name: The Territory of Egg
description: This is a variant tower defense indie game. Use the Egg Warriors to form a defense line, observe the type and distribution of the enemy, use the terrain structure, build a reasonable formation, explore different skill combinations, and protect the Holy Egg.

name: Castle of Deceit
description: Castle of Deceit is a first-person shooting battle game that takes place on an alien planet. You will play the leading role in finding the weak truth in the quagmire of lies and make your decision to find your lover.

name: Balance Weight
description: Arrange your cats and other items to 2 sides of the scale to balance. Sound easy right? But it will blow you mind when you actually solve it.

name: Polaretti
description:
Help the Polaretti Team use their superpowers to overcome the evil Minorca
An exciting adventure is starting in Polarettiland! Minorca is more evil than ever, and this time she is ready to do anything to steal all the fruit. Will the “Polaretti Team” succeed in overcoming her, thanks to your help and their superpowers? Join them in their world, and help make them stronger collecting all the fruit.

name: Sokoboxes Duo
description: A new game based on Sokoban.

name: Glory Room
description: Glory Room is a Roguelike game that can be played quickly and lightly. It proceeds with stories of the characters who have no choice but to come to the hellish arena. Various items, monsters and traps give you trials. Overcome it and create your own show to defeat the demons and reclaim your glory!

name: Fly Fishing 3D II
description:
The sequel of 'Fly Fishing 3D'! The fly fishing game that exceeded 4 million DL!
Experience our new fly fishing game with overwhelmingly evolved 3D graphics!!
Also, it became more exciting by adding new elements: Underwater camera, new actions, fight scene, and competing with NPCs!

name: Into the Winds: Zen Flowers
description: Into the Winds: Zen Flowers aims to provide a meditative gameplay experience. Take your time to match flowers and watch as the flowers disperses their petals, carried away by the gentle breeze. A down to earth Match-2 puzzle game infused with elements of Zen.

name: Food Dude
description: Food Dude is a cancelled game for the CD-i.

name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2: Enhanced Edition
description: Take the role of a special agent deployed deep beyond enemy lines. You will seek, locate and destroy the enemy while causing havoc and confusion. Emerge a hardcore tactical experience in vast, nonlinear missions where skill and tactical decisions matter!

name: Fight'n Rage: 5th Anniversary Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Park Beyond: Impossified Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tintin Reporter: Cigars of the Pharaoh - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners - Tourist Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Flower House
description: Sin descripción

name: Dune of the Desert
description: A vehicular-combat focused game set in a post apocalyptic desert, the player takes the role of a bounty hunter tasked with taking down some of the most feared creatures in the desert. Collect artefacts, crystals, and other highly sort after items to upgrade your vehicle for high intensity combat.

name: Surviving the Aftermath: Forgotten Tracks
description: Here is what’s left of Music: old tapes, cassettes, forgotten tunes that re-emerged from the ruins of society as we know it. With different styles and origins, Forgotten Tracks is the perfect soundtrack for surviving the Aftermath.

name: Ticket to Ride: Poland
description: Sin descripción

name: Robo Frenzy
description: Build and battle in Robo Frenzy! Create dozens of weapons and construct inventions to crush gigantic gadgets in a sandbox action game that blends crafting with combat.

name: Criminals Within
description: Embark on an epic journey through a medieval fantasy land inhabited by powerful, de-evolved dragons. Join forces with a friend in this asymmetric co-op multiplayer adventure. Engage in skill-based combat, take on epic boss battles, solve cooperative puzzles and enjoy lighthearted comedy.

name: Ohana Island: Blast & Build
description:
Forget about all the hustle and bustle of the city, and live a life away from worry in the brand new matching game "Ohana Island"️!
Push open windows, breathe in the fresh air, and enjoy puzzles & delicate flowers in your shop at the seaside.

name: Celesteia
description: Celesteia is a 2D sandbox game that is currently in development.

name: Clockmaker
description: Rescue the town from the evil curse of the Old Clockmaker! Enjoy an addicting story, solve the mystery and save the city from the villain. Thousands of levels of adventure match three are waiting for you right now!

name: Eddie’s Puzzle Time
description: Eddie’s Puzzle Time is an unreleased puzzle game for the Game Boy.

name: WWW
description: World Wide Warfare (WWW) is the final battle between the good and evil forces of the ancient and modern world. Join the fray.

name: Coding Robo
description: Learn programming in a fun way! An educational game that teaches the basics of programming and algorithmic logic. No prior knowledge of programming is required to play.

name: Touchstarved
description: You were born cursed, with hands that twist the mind of any human you touch. Desperation leads you to the shadowy city of Eridia, where your fate intertwines with 5 monstrous strangers. Each can offer you salvation or damnation. Find a cure for your curse in Touchstarved, a gothic horror romance visual novel.

name: Pizza Snake
description:
Pizza Snake is a fun and challenging snake game for all audiences.
You control the snake to eat as many pizzas as you can. Each pizza gives you points.
With points, you collect stars. There are 5 stars for each level.
Pizza Snake has 8 levels and your goal is to collect all 80 stars.

name: The Amazing Circus
description:
The circus is in town! Welcome to The Amazing Circus, where you’re the star attraction!
Can you make the jump to the other side?
Can you get all the stars?
Can you ignite the crowd with a Jump Frenzy?
Fill up the entertainment meter and earn extra points by unleashing the Jump Frenzy!

name: Tower Maze
description:
Tower Maze is a simple puzzle game, easy to play and suitable for all ages.
Select from 2 play modes and solve a huge number of mazes, randomly generated.

name: Skater Escape
description:
You need to escape quickly!!! A lot of cops are chasing you for using the streets to make stunts on your skateboard.
Tilt the skateboard by taping in the circles with the arrows, and don't forget... make a lot of stunts for getting speed and lose all the cops.

name: Amber Halls
description:
Amber Halls is a palace filled with ancient artefacts and treasures. Dangerous monsters wander through the halls, but with the help of powerful items you'll be able to outsmart them. However, carrying items from room to room will prove challenging.
Amber Halls is a tiny mix of roguelike and sokoban. If you like puzzle games that you can play forever you are going to love this.

name: Dream Swim
description:
An action game that relies on precision skills to get you into a breathtaking journey to outer space and beyond.
Forget imprecise motion-sensing stuff, clumsy controls or a screen cluttered with buttons – like the annoying virtual pad on touch-based devices. Really, just use your thumbs on the screen to move back and forth and enjoy the awesome ride.
Simple gestures give you total control to bounce the fish around: Choose the way you want to go and take advantage of precise landings to gain impulse and progress into this psychedelic journey.

name: Propel Man
description: Use the Catapult to dispatch the Propel Man to dizzy heights in the sky and cross each level by landing safely past the finish line by deploying your parachute.

name: Rock Crawler
description: Can you imagine a truck that climbs on rocks better and faster than humans? Meet Rock Crawler! This game pretty much resembles a real rock crawling: very precise throttle control is required to conquer some peaks. These big soft wheels allow you to climb on craggy rocks and perform terrific stunts!

name: Turbo Racing: New Cars
description: Take control of new racing cars! Feel the new atmosphere with the first expansion Turbo Racing: New Cars!

name: The Wingless Bee
description: The Wingless Bee is a brand new Frogger-inspired game where a bee named Bella is abruptly thrown far away from the hive she lives and works at. With her wings destroyed, she can only hop to get back home.

name: Gutterbrawlers
description: Gutterbrawlers is a snappy 2D fighting game with a combat system inspired by early Klassics. Featuring online mode with rollback netcode implemented using GGPO open-source code.

name: Candy's Town
description:
This time, sweetheart Candy will show her talent of being a mayor. She is just a kid, but she never disappoints people. See~ owing to her great effort, this place becomes fantastic. A little girl may harbor big power, yes, that's Candy.

In this game, she is a nice doctor, young in age, but expert in medical skill; she is a brave firefighter, so putting out a fire and saving people are a piece of cake; she is a righteous policewoman, catching the thief easily with her unique skill. Well, the little mayor may be a super hero, but not a superhuman. Sometimes she is terribly busy and that's why she needs a warmhearted partner like you.

name: Dig Dug
description: A cancelled ColecoVision port of Dig Dug.

name: King: A Bullet-Hell RPG
description: 2D Pico-8 platformer, rpg, and boss rush.

name: PolyCraft
description: Polycraft is a 3D action tower defence game. Explore the island, help the Wildlings and gather resources to build a base.

name: Final Three Kingdoms 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Treasure Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Pumpkin Delivery
description: After carving her own pumpkin, Murphy decides to give it to her grandmother and goes out on Halloween night without her parents for the first time. Thus begins her fight against the Halloween evil that has come to life in the city.

name: Silly Royale: Devil Amongst Us
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario 7-in-1
description: Mario 7-in-1 is an unlicensed multicart game for Famicom, best known for it's inclusion of 7 Grand Dad.

name: Star Equestrian
description:
Snowdrop. A majestic rescue horse. Together, the two of you had the potential to be a perfect duo, real contenders for the much coveted Evervale Championship title, but life had other plans. One accident was all it took. Falling from Snowdrop, you were left injured. Snowdrop, in the panic, darted away and never returned to your family ranch. Years passed, but memories of Snowdrop still remained, and you’re still as determined as ever to find him.

Return to your family ranch and begin your adventure in the small town of Heartside.

name: Brave the Dungeon
description: Brave the Dungeon is a thrilling and immersive multiplayer open-world game that takes you on an epic journey to fight against the daemonic invasion threatening the archipelago.

name: Champion Cup Goal 2
description:
Do you want your football club team be the winner of the world champion cup?
Play this fantastic football game, choose your team and your rival, dribble, dodge the opposing players and score the maximum of goals. Raise your team to the top of the ranking and sink your rival to hell by subtracting goals.
Don't miss the opportunity to play in this world tournament your own world league and score goals for your team. This is no normal scorers league… Dare with your favorite sport and rise the ranking of your team to the top of the world.
Defeat your opponents, win the league and turn your team into a legend!

name: Bouncy Goal
description:
The coolest way to score a goal is with your head.
Aim for the heads of the players to pass the ball and finally score a goal.
The game is so much fun, even birds join in to play.
Watch out for the evil referee, he is there to ruin the game.

name: Cricket League
description: Bat, bowl and field your way to the top of the league in this fast, fun, exciting and authentic real-time multiplayer Cricket game. Play quick two over matches against your friends or players around the world in just a few minutes! Ready..Set..Start your own Cricket saga now!

name: Crashletics
description: Unbuckle your seatbelt, smash through the window and compete in a series of track and field events using momentum and gravity to travel the furthest, highest and quickest. Upgrade your skills by your beating personal best and aim for the world record.

name: AR Race Car
description:
Augmented Reality just got real. From life-sized race cars out on the street, beach or backyard to toy-sized cars on your desk or living room floor, AR Race Car gives you the thrill of tire-smoking burnouts, drifting and cornering wherever you are.
AR Race Car is Augmented Reality like you've never seen it before! Take it out into the street, drop a car, scale it up to full size and lay down some tire smoking burnouts! Or scale it down and rip it up on your desktop or living room floor!
Realistic high-res models, shadows, and engine-revving and tire-spinning sound effects will make it feel like the cars are right there with you! Fasten your seat belt, start your engine and prepare to be blown away as you drive your Augmented Reality

name: Crazy Pizza Boy
description:
Crazy Pizza Boy is a open world endless pizza delivery game , which uses spectacular graphics and amazing audio effects to give breath taking game play experience.
Crazy Pizza Boy is a fast paced action / racing game in which you will have to race against time to deliver pizzas, make your way through city traffic as your tires burn against the asphalt. The game also features mind blowing audio - visual effects that improve the game play beyond the ordinary. We don't believe in restricting you to limited environment , hence the city is open for you !! You can make your own path towards your goal. The game also features 3 different controllers , so play comfortably according to you ! There are 3 power ups available to help you in your mission to serve delicious pizzas to everyone.

name: Yurei Ninja
description:
You: A ninja, back from the dead, seeking revenge against…
The Enemy: A samurai warlord with the blackest of hearts who turned against you!
Trained in the art of hiding and surprise attacks, avoid traps, strike down enemies and destroy deadly bosses, all trying to stop your quest.

name: Rush Rally
description: Realistic yet fun car physics programmed from real car telemetry! Experience rallying at its best, drift and kick up endless amounts of dust and snow!

name: Pet Cube: Tower Stack
description: Stack the cubes as high as you can! Simple & adorable graphics. Compete with players around the world, earn yourself a spot on the leaderboard!

name: Find the Road
description:
The characters in Find The Road are experienced travelers. In this fantastic world, the roads do not stand in place, you constantly need to rearrange everything!
Just drag the fragments to put them back in order, but will you be clever enough to do it? The more you advance, the more complex paths will become.

name: Ultimate Jewel
description: Ultimate Jewel is a match-3 game with exotic theme. This brain teasing game will give you tons of fun with special designed levels. Show your best strategical moves to get higher score ranking and stars award to process to the next stage. Challenge every aspect of your brain to be the first one to clear all thousand levels!

name: Griddler
description:
Use the numerical clues to fill in the correct tiles and complete the grid!
Race against the clock as you compete against players from around the world for the fastest times per gridsize.
Griddler, also known as Nonogram, Hanjie and Picross, comes with unlimited randomly created levels in 6 different size grids!
Our adaptive difficulty system makes the game more challenging as you improve. Keep levelling and ranking until you're the master of the game!
Reached the ultimate rank and want something more challenging?

name: Gangnam City Deluxe
description: Dancing in Gangnam city like a pro! Can't stop moving, earn coins, get money with your style! Like the old platform games, you will be running and jumping on buildings, and that's not all, you will be able to ride a bike, drive a car and also fly with your private plane!!!

name: Tofu Go! 2: The Onsen Adventure
description:
Tofu has been enjoying life in his mountain cabin since escaping from the evil chopsticks. But life isn't all beer and tofu, the chopsticks are finally here again...
Let's run with Tofu again and enjoy this amazing Onsen (hot springs) journey!

name: Climb and Fall Dice Adventure
description: Get ready for a thrilling new take on the classic "Snake and Ladder" game with "Climb and Fall: A Dice Adventure"! With intuitive controls and easy-to-learn rules, this exciting game is perfect for players of all ages and skill levels. Roll the dice and climb your way to the top, but be careful of the pitfalls and obstacles that lie in your path. Will you be able to outwit your opponents and emerge victorious?

name: Armored Heroes
description:
We need you, Commander!
World War II is one of the most significant events in the history of human kind. Thousands of heroes fought these battles with aircrafts, ships, as infantry or with tanks. We remember them to this day on different ways with memorials, statues, maquettes or with dioramas. As children we often Imagined that these monuments come alive and we could play them. Inspired by such a diorama, in Armored Heroes we commemorate the most important tank battles of World War II.

name: Future Sense
description:
Time waits for no one... except you. Does that mean it's on your side?
Find out in this episodic adventure with a time-travel twist. Use stealth, wits, and your strange experimental powers to stay one step ahead of your pursuers. Piece together the mystery of Sennin Systems and perhaps find a cure for your chronological curse.
The only person you can rely on is yourself - and your past is sure to catch up with you.

name: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal
description:
Learn World War II history with a classic hex-and-counter digital war game covering the naval-air battles of the Pacific War, in the South Pacific and Central Pacific in 1942-1943.

Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal is a classic hex-and-counter war game covering the naval-air battles during the Pacific War in 1942-1943.

name: Tap Rising
description:
Tap your way up to the unlimited height.
The big scary Block.K has kidnapped your princess,
and all of the sudden, blocks started to fall from sky!
Chase the Block.K over the universe and set unbreakable record.

name: Croquet Clash
description: Play explosive real-time multiplayer croquet right from your phone!

name: Crazy Open Car
description:
The Crazy Open Car store is here!
Ordinary cars? Luxury cars? Who cares, let's turn them into open cars!
Make the drivers happy with their new open cars!

name: The Journey
description: Surf over 300 waves from around the world, ride boards from the top shapers and style out with well-known brands in The Journey!

name: Racing Limits
description: Racing Limits defines the mobile standards of infinite arcade type racing games. Based on racing and overtaking vehicles both in city and highway traffic, this game features 5 enjoyable modes of racing: carrier mode, infinite mode, against-time mode, free mode and a multiplayer mode. You can choose between one-way and two-way traffic and choose among three times of day periods, namely “Morning”, “Sunset” and “Night”.

name: Sky Driver
description: Afraid of heights? Don't look down. A quick game of tightrope driving along a wavy, narrow road, on a car that goes faster and faster. Steer left and right to stay on the track and don't fall down. If you think you got the nerve, think twice!

name: Bouncing Wheel: Highway Monster
description: Get your fastest fingers and try this quick reflexive game. Hell broke loose when your monster truck explodes and the Tires are on Mayhem on the highway. Just tap to bounce the monstrous tire away from the oncoming traffic. Stay in the game until you crash.

name: Korean Drama Girl Adventures
description:
Flex your girl power in the fun new running game by Free Action Games Plus Fun Apps, Adventures of Korean Girl. In this cool new iPhone game for independent girls, you play a cute Korean girl running across a cartoon city and evading lovestruck men all dead set on getting her out for a date.

Use your touch screen to control our hero in her sprint for freedom as the men surround her and chase her everywhere she goes.
Avoid the man with the chocolates, pursing his lips for a kiss. Dodge the elegant schmuck, kneeling to offer a ring, and flee the poor, ragged sap with his fresh-picked flower as fast as your legs will carry you. Oh, and watch out for the creepy emo punk boy as he comes skidding across the street to offer his own token of love, a hideous dark collar.

name: Pocket Rush
description:
Explore different continents and conquer the tracks in this fun and engaging speed challenge.

Fly down the straightaways but control your speed at the curves to become the master of the track! Dominate the track and leave your competitors in the dust!
Challenge your friends and other racers to battle it out on the track, and participate in tournaments to become a Legend in the leaderboards!

name: Bang Bang Tennis
description:
Get ready for... Bang Bang Tennis! A fun and crazy fast paced tennis game
Take on the world’s best and become the Bang Bang Grand Champion in this fast paced Bash and Smash Tennis game.

Bang Bang tennis, a new kind of tennis, with barriers to stop the ball from going out, the goal is simple, smash the ball past your opponent.

name: Shepherd
description: Lead a small herd of sheep through the desert. Ensure their survival by managing their needs. Protect and save them from various environmental hazards, as well as their own silly decisions. Bond with them over the course of your journey by fulfilling their wishes, and be their Shepherd.

name: Pale Cinder
description: Death is not the end! Slash, dash, parkour and manipulate time in this 2d action plaformer.

name: Midnight Market
description: Welcome to the seedy side of town, try to make money, while dodging knife fights, and running from the law.

name: Rakuen: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Milky Animals
description: Battle of cute animals and cute monsters Evolve into a cuter and more powerful animal with an evolution potion animal strategy game A game that anyone can enjoy

name: Race Horses Champions 3
description: In this third version, Race Horses Champions comes with completely new and awesome features. Now, the player can face its friends on Multiplayer matches, and customize its character as well. The 3D graphics has been improved bringing great experiences and emotions of a horse race in a immersive environment. Managing your money and your stable, the player buys his horses, which has its own attributes, and participates in events to test their skills.

name: Can Your Lemon
description: 'Can Your Lemon?' is a cute simulation game where your lemon is waiting for you!

name: Four: The Space Fight
description: Face-to-face multi-player fun or the challenge of a single-player career mode. A carefully crafted space shooter, that stands out of others in the genre with a different approach, fast paced gameplay, and unique design.

name: Mini Golf Space
description: Enjoy 50 challenging holes of mini golf set in space. With obstacles such as anti gravity, portals, robots and lasers, you'll have plenty of fun trying to get the best score.

name: ZokaDice
description: ZokaDice is the game of luck and strategy. Game play is simple and familiar as offered by games like Yahtzee. Let the dice roll in this exciting game of chance and strategy. Challenge friends or meet new people from all over the world, while enjoying this great, familiar game.

name: Two Touch: Switch
description: Two Touch: Switch is a new type of 3 match game.

name: eFootball Champion Squads
description: Introducing the most famous footballers from around the world, now with photo-realistic likeness! Play at your own pace with auto matchplay and high-quality 3D graphics! Use the best players and tactics to take on world-class opponents on the pitch!

name: Space Trump
description: Trump is on a new quest! To explore Space! Help him navigate this vast new real estate and see how far he can spread the American Flag!!

name: The Curse of Kubel: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Chucky: Wanna Play?
description: Chucky: Wanna Play? is a stealth-action video game, based on the Child's Play franchise.

name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Operation: Graduates
description: Operation: Graduates is the game is based on the Codename: Kids Next Door episode of the same name.

name: One Piece Card Game Tutorial
description:
One Piece Card Game is a collectible card game themed on the world of One Piece!
Characters from all over the history of One Piece, including the anime, manga, and movies, are featured in the game, and there are even cards inspired by famous scenes from all of them!

name: Bagels
description: Bagels is a mastermind game where the player must guess the computer's code. Codes consist of three numbers. After each guess of the player, the computer answers fermi (one digit is at the right position), pico (one digit is in the code but on a different position), or bagels (none of the digits are correct). The goal is to guess the number in as few tries as possible, so players must use the answers to infer the right code.

name: 1-900-Cult
description: Under the neon shadows of Miami, a mysterious cult searches for a way to bring about an end to life- and death- as we know it. Who will stop their horrific summons?

name: Ra Ra Boom
description: Ra Ra Boom is a 2D, co-op beat ’em up driven by a coming-of-age narrative about a group of ninja cheerleaders from space in a fight to save the rest of humanity on Earth.

name: Golden Memory 2
description: Golden Memory 2 is a re-imagining of the universe of Five Nights at Freddy's

name: Qualia/Delta
description: A in-development PC otome game.

name: Key La Box
description: In development otome game.

name: Mekakare
description: In development otome game.

name: Distant Worlds 2: Factions - Ikkuro and Dhayut
description: Sin descripción

name: Chi Ninja
description: In a world full of ninjas chi ninja will fight his way to freedom a fast pace speed runner platformer with sharp ninja moves grappling hock and ninja stars aswell as a katana will our hero survive the ninja army.

name: Horace to the Rescue
description: Horace to the Rescue is a cancelled game for the ZX Spectrum.

name: Scooby-Doo and a Mummy, Too!
description: When the Egyptian exhibit at the university falls under the attack of one of its own exhibits, someone needs to step in and save the day. The Mystery Gang is on the job in another confounding conundrum, and you're here to help them out. One of the mummies has mysteriously reanimated and is doing his best to stop everyone in their tracks. Help these meddling kids while keeping an eye out for the toilet-paper tyrant — one look and he'll turn you into stone. Get on the case and dig up some concrete evidence to put this villain away.Scooby-Doo and a Mummy Too lands you in the middle of a heart-pumping adventure. Employ your reading skills to help the Mystery Gang save the day.

name: The Little Engine That Could
description: A Merry Engine is pulling cars filled with toys and food for the good boys and girls when it cannot go any further. The little clown asks some other Engines for help but all of them refuse to pull the train. Finally, a little Blue Engine pulls the train over the mountain with her spirit and determination, telling herself "I think I can, I think I can, I think I can." Join the Little Engine on her journey and learn the importance of bravery and courage.

name: Thomas & Friends: Up, Up and Away! Diesel's Special Delivery
description: Up, Up and Away! Diesel's Special Delivery is a video game that was released for Vtech's V. Reader System. It was released in 2012.

name: SCP-087-B Extended Edition
description: This mod expands SCP-087-B by giving it new content, such as new floors, events, monsters, and also introduces some new features

name: Guardian of Dynamite: A Bomb Protector
description: It is a puzzle-type mini-game that slows down the time bomb in the dynamite barrel with simple key operations, simple mathematical formulas, and key input, and endures until the time the bomb is dismantled. Will you be able to save the city by holding out until the time to defuse the bomb?

name: Lockdown VR: Forgotten Temple
description: Archaeologists claimed to have discovered an ancient temple that has been forgotten for centuries. All the tomb raiders are now trying to locate it but you seem to be the first to find it after a long search. Will you be able to find any treasures before the others arrive?

name: Metal War
description: This is a fast-paced top-down shooting and tower defense game. You need to customize and upgrade your chariot, build defensive structures to protect your base, explore the world and destroy all enemies! Don't forget to come back and defend when the enemy attacks! Can you make it to the end?

name: Aby Escape
description: Help poor Aby, the unluckiest and clumsiest raccoon, escape from his assailants. Whether being pursued by the hunters in his native forest, by the police in town or by the bikers on Route 66.5, Aby never stops running to escape from all these dangers.

name: X-Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Death Moto
description: Come and experience gives you unlimited pleasure, you know!

name: Blight Night: You Are Not Safe
description:
Video may have killed the radio star, but a supposed flu outbreak may have killed humanity leaving one man to survive the horrors of the aftermath.
West Texas, 1986. Sonny Barstow relished small-town life. The ever looming mystery of why he awoke seemingly untouched by the ravages of the bizarre outbreak.
Part 1980s horror flick, part puzzle-solving adventure, Blight Night shoots for exceptional exploration and discovery — without sacrificing the splatterfest.

name: Dungeon Creator
description: This is an online 2D platform game about dungeon, where you can build scenes and take adventures. You can not only design your own dungeon, but also challenge dungeons of other game players.We provide a wealth of dungeon game material. It's totally up to you to decide the layout of the entire dungeon, as well as the placement of each trap and enemy!Also you can take adventures in almost unlimited number of dungeons created by other players, plunder their treasure, and show them your super game skills!

name: Chariot Racer
description:
A battle to the death!
Avoid the monsters, bloodied spikes, flying spears, and blasts of fire as you race around the coliseum track in a battle for survival! Challenge your friends to best your time! Survive long enough and be rewarded the coveted "3rd Star".

name: Zig Zag Boom
description:
Control an orb ball along the zigzag path and don't hit the wall.
Tap to switch the direction! How fast can you react?
Sound simple? Challenge yourself in this amazing free arcade game!

name: Squared: Adjacent Stones
description: In this Puzzle / Logic game you need to convert enough stones from the field to win the level. The amount of necessary stones will vary and there is an AI Opponent who will try to out-play you. You can only move in straight lines from stones that you already control. Stones that you move over, will fall into your control.

name: The Track Star
description: Are you the new drag strip champion? Take your talents to the track and race in the high stakes drag race.

name: Cross or Crash
description:
A unique puzzle game never seen before!
Get the exact timing on the congested road so that characters do not crash with each other and fire!

name: Harvest Season: Sudoku Puzzle
description:
If you love classic sudoku, mixed with innovative puzzle elements, you are in the right place!
Welcome to Harvest Season, the game that will forever change the way you play Sudoku!
Embark on an exciting journey with Abi and her fruit buddies as they travel through a beautifully crafted world and solve addictive puzzles!

name: Cat Cafe: Dessert Panic
description: Cat Cafe Dessert Panic! Is an action-adventure game where you, as Pera, are the waitress at a cafe for cats. The cats are excited to eat, and they'll do anything to get in your way. Do not drop the desserts or it's game over!

name: Lunar Laser
description: Tap to push you through space. Avoid all lasers and obstacles and collect as many stars as you can.

name: Shapey Heads
description:
Welcome to the colorful 8-bit world of Shapey Heads!
Tap the screen to switch the shape of your head to avoid all of the traps and obstacles!
Collect coins to open up secret boxes that will let you play with over 40 of the craziest characters through 5 different challenging worlds.
Run as long as you can to improve your high score and climb the leaderboards!

name: Cyber Lust
description: Cyber Lust is an adult game set in a cyberpunk world.

name: Dino Fighters
description: A fighting game featuring chibi dinosaurs, developed for Sega Genesis using Hamoopig & SGDK, by Juca Jacaré

name: Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip - Hitchhiker Pack: Vicky & Brian
description: Sin descripción

name: Blood and Zombies: Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mine Shaft
description: Addictive mining game where players dig deeper into the earth to find valuable minerals and upgrade their equipment. Beware of earthquakes that can damage your mine, and use explosives strategically to clear your way.

name: Atlas Fallen: Signature Edition
description: Atlas Fallen: Signature Edition is a Focus Entertainment Store exclusive product, strictly limited to 100 copies worldwide. It includes an exclusive artwork by the game's Senior Concept Artist Janine Bertet alongside Art Director James Lowe as a numbered laminated wooden frame (artwork printed on wood), a certificate of authenticity hand-signed by the artist, a digital or a physical copy of the game for the platform of your choice using James Lowe’s artwork as an exclusive box art and the Ruin Rising Pack DLC.

name: Vallen
description: Space combat on a massive scale. Defend your allies, destroy the Xeris and claim victory for the Vallen! Your people need you, fly your ship in an intense battle in an asteroid field to secure the sector.

name: Twinsen's Little Big Adventure Remastered 2
description: Built from the ground up, enjoy new breathtaking visuals, enhanced music and improved, deeper gameplay as Twinsen's Little Big Adventure 2 - Remastered reignites the original LBA2/Twinsen's Odyssey game using the latest next-generation technology.

name: Sandoria
description: This is a 2D platformer with a conditionally infinite procedurally generated world. A very deep and varied world full of interesting and dangerous things to explore.

name: JetMan Galactic
description: Jetman Galactic is part of a 3 game series coming to iOS telling the story of earths last action hero.

name: Dark Walk
description: Close your eyes, let the sound guides you cross the adventure. In this app, you need to draw the correct path according to the different sounds. Try it!

name: Diver Dash
description:
Diver Dash is a fast-paced scrolling arcade game where you avoid sharks and mines on your endless descent to the ocean floor. Press the screen to stop the obstacles and dash through the gaps.
Compete with your Game Center friends and collect coins and clams to unlock all the wacky characters and themes. What are you waiting for? Dive in today!

name: Iron Kill
description: Like robots, battlebots, robot fighting games? Then Iron Kill is for you!
